Jai Ahoi Mata Jai Ahoi Mata\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Tumko Nisdin Dhyavat Hari Vishnu Dhata\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Brahamni Rudrani Kamla tu he hai Jag Datta\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Surya Chandrama Dhyavat Narad Rishi Gatta\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Mata Roop Niranjan Sukh Sampatti Datta\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Jo koi Tumko Dhyavat Nit Mangal Patta\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Tu he hai Pataal Basanti tu he hai Sukh Datta\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Karma Prabhav Prakashak Jagniddhi Se Trata\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jis Ghar Tharo Vaas Wahi Mein Gunna Atta\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Kar Na Sake Soi Kar Le Mann Nahi Ghabrata\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Tum Bin Sukh Na Hovay Putra Na Koi Patta\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Khan-Paan Ka Vaibhav Tum Bin Nahi Atta\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Subh gun Sundar Yukta Sheer Niddhi Jatta\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Ratan Chaturdarsh tokun koi nahi Patta\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Shree Ahoi Maa ki Aarti jo koi gatta\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Ur Umang Atti Upjay Paap Uttar Jatta\u0965<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"2","post_id":"2","lang_id":"2","post_title":"Budhwari (Wednesday) Aarti","post_desc":"

Aarti YugalKishore ki kijay.<\/p>\n

Tann Mann Nyuchavar kijay.<\/p>\n

GaurShyam mukh nirkhan leejay.<\/p>\n

Hari ka swaroop nayan bhari peejay.<\/p>\n

Ravi Shashi koti badan ki shobha.<\/p>\n

Tahi nirakh mero mann lobha.<\/p>\n

Odde neel peet pat sari.<\/p>\n

Kunj Bihari girivardhari.<\/p>\n

Phulan ki sej phulan ki mala.<\/p>\n

Ratan sinhasan baithe Nandlala.<\/p>\n

Kanchan thar kapur ki bati.<\/p>\n

Hari aye nirmal bahi chhati.<\/p>\n

Shree Purshottam Girivardhari.<\/p>\n

Aarti karat sakal Brajanari.<\/p>\n

Nand-nandan Brajbhan kishori.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Parmanand Swami avichal jori.<\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"3","post_id":"3","lang_id":"2","post_title":"Durga Maa Aarti","post_desc":"

Jai ambe gauri, mayya jai shyama gauri<\/p>\n

Tumko nish-din dhyavat, hari brahma shivji, Jai ambe gauri<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Maang sindoor virajat, tiko mrig-mad ko<\/p>\n

Ujjwal se dou naina, chandra vadan niko, Jai ambe gauri<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Kanak samaan kalewar, raktaambar raaje<\/p>\n

Rakt pushp gal-mala, kanthan par saaje, Jai ambe gauri<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Kehri vahan rajat, kharag khapar dhaari<\/p>\n

Sur nar muni jan sevat, tinke dukh haari, Jai ambe gauri<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Kanan kundal shobhit, naas-agre moti<\/p>\n

Kotik chandra divakar, sum rajat jyoti, Jai ambe gauri<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Shumbh ni-shumbh vidare, mahisha sur ghati<\/p>\n

Dhumra-vilochan naina, nish-din- mad mati, Jai ambe gauri<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Chandh mundh sangh-haare, shonit beej hare<\/p>\n

Madhu kaitabh dou maare, sur bhe heen kare, Jai ambe gauri<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Brahmani rudrani, tum kamla rani<\/p>\n

Aagam nigam bakhani, tum shiv patrani,Jai ambe gauri<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Chon-sath yogini gavat, nritya karat bhairon<\/p>\n

Baajat taal mridanga, aur baajat damaroomaroo , Jai ambe gauri<\/p>\n

Tum ho jag ki maata, tum hi ho bharta<\/p>\n

Bhakto ki dukh harata, sukh sampati karata, Jai ambe gauri<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Bhuja chaar ati shobit, var mudra dhaari<\/p>\n

Man vaanchit phal pavat, sevat nar naari, Jai ambe gauri<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Kanchan thaal virajat, agar kapoor baati<\/p>\n

Shri maal-ketu me rajat, kotik ratan jyoti, Jai ambe gauri<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Shri ambe-ji-ki aaarti, jo koi nar gaave<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Kahat shivanand swami, sukh sampati pave, Jai ambe gauri<\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"4","post_id":"4","lang_id":"1","post_title":"\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940 \u0926\u0941\u0930\u094d\u0917\u093e \u091c\u0940 \u0915\u0940 \u0906\u0930\u0924\u0940","post_desc":"

 <\/p>\n

Tere Hi Gun Gayen Bharti,O Maiya Hum Sab Utare Teri Aarti ll<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Tere Bhakt Jano Pe Mata Bheer Padi Hai Bhari l<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Danav Dal Par Toot Pado Maa Karke Sinh Savar ll<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Sou Sou Sinho Se Hai Balshali Hai Dus Bhujaon Wali l<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Dukhion Ke Dukhde Niwarti,O Maiya Hum Sab Utare Teri Aarti ll<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Om Jai Gange Mata, Shri Jai Gange Mata<\/p>\n

Jo Nar Tumko Dhyata, Man Vanchit Phal Pata<\/p>\n

Gyan ko dip aur shraddha ki bati<\/p>\n

So bhakti hi purti karai jahan ghiki, aarti…<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Devi ki joti jagai jahniki, aarti…<\/p>\n

Jai Kali Mata , Maa Jai Maha Kali Maa<\/p>\n

Ratabeeja Vadh Kaarini Maata<\/p>\n

Suranara Muni Dhyaataa, Maa Jai Maha Kali Maa<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Daksha Yagya Vid Vansa Karani Maa Shubha Nishumbh Haarlee<\/p>\n

Madhu Aur Kaitabha Naashini Maata …<\/p>\n

Mahisasura Maradini…O Mata Jai Maha Kaali Maa<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Hey Hima Giriki Nandini Prakriti Racha Itthi<\/p>\n

Kaala Vinaashini Kaali Mata<\/p>\n

Suranjana Sukha Daatri Hey Maata<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Anndham Vastram Daayaani Maata Adi Shakti Ambe<\/p>\n

Kanakana Kana Nivaasini Maata<\/p>\n

Bhagawati Jagadambe … O Mata Jai Maha Kaali Maa<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Dakshina Kaali Aadhyaa Kaali …Kaali Naama Roopaa<\/p>\n

Teeno Loka Vichaariti Maata Dharma Moksha Roopa<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u0936\u0941\u092e\u094d\u092d<\/span> \u0928\u093f\u0936\u0941\u092e\u094d\u092d<\/span> \u0915\u094b<\/span> \u0915\u094d\u0937\u0923<\/span> \u092e\u0947<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0930\u0947<\/span> ,\u092e\u0939\u093f\u0937\u093e\u0938\u0941\u0930<\/span> \u0915\u094b<\/span> \u092a\u0915\u0921<\/span> \u0926\u0932\u0947<\/span> \u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0906\u0926\u093f\u0924<\/span> \u0935\u093e\u0930\u0940<\/span> \u0906\u0926\u093f<\/span> \u092d\u0935\u093e\u0928\u0940<\/span> ,\u091c\u0928<\/span> \u0905\u092a\u0928\u0947<\/span> \u0915\u094b<\/span> \u0915\u0937\u094d\u091f<\/span> \u0939\u0930\u0947<\/span> \u0964\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u0915\u0941\u092a\u093f\u0924<\/span> \u0939\u094b\u0915\u0930<\/span> \u0926\u0928\u0935<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0930\u0947<\/span>, \u091a\u0923\u094d\u0921\u092e\u0941\u0923\u094d\u0921<\/span> \u0938\u092c<\/span> \u091a\u0942\u0930<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0947\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u092c<\/span> \u0924\u0941\u092e<\/span> \u0926\u0947\u0916\u0940<\/span> \u0926\u092f\u093e<\/span> \u0930\u0942\u092a<\/span> \u0939\u094b<\/span>, \u092a\u0932<\/span> \u092e\u0947<\/span> \u0938\u0915\u0902\u091f<\/span> \u0926\u0942\u0930<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0947\u0964\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u0938\u094c\u092e\u094d\u092f<\/span> \u0938\u094d\u0935\u092d\u093e\u0935<\/span> \u0927\u0930\u092f\u094b<\/span> \u092e\u0947\u0930\u0940<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0924\u093e<\/span> ,\u091c\u0928<\/span> \u0915\u0940<\/span> \u0905\u0930\u094d\u091c<\/span> \u0915\u092c\u0942\u0932<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0947<\/span> \u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0938\u093e\u0924<\/span> \u092c\u093e\u0930<\/span> \u0915\u0940<\/span> \u092e\u0939\u093f\u092e\u093e<\/span> \u092c\u0930\u0928\u0940<\/span>, \u0938\u092c<\/span> \u0917\u0941\u0923<\/span> \u0915\u094c\u0928<\/span> \u092c\u0916\u093e\u0928<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0947\u0964\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u0938\u093f\u0902\u0939<\/span> \u092a\u0940\u0920<\/span> \u092a\u0930<\/span> \u091a\u0922\u0940<\/span> \u092d\u0935\u093e\u0928\u0940<\/span>, \u0905\u091f\u0932<\/span> \u092d\u0935\u0928<\/span> \u092e\u0947<\/span> \u0930\u093e\u091c\u094d\u092f<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0947\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0926\u0930\u094d\u0936\u0928<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0935\u0947<\/span> \u092e\u0902\u0917\u0932<\/span> \u0917\u093e\u0935\u0947<\/span> ,\u0938\u093f\u0926\u094d\u0927<\/span> \u0938\u093e\u0927\u0915<\/span> \u0924\u0947\u0930\u0940<\/span> \u092d\u0947\u091f<\/span> \u0927\u0930\u0947<\/span> \u0964\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u092c\u094d\u0930\u0939\u094d\u092e\u093e<\/span> \u0935\u0947\u0926<\/span> \u092a\u0922\u0947<\/span> \u0924\u0947\u0930\u0947<\/span> \u0926\u094d\u0935\u093e\u0930\u0947<\/span>, \u0936\u093f\u0935<\/span> \u0936\u0902\u0915\u0930<\/span> \u0939\u0930\u0940<\/span> \u0927\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0928<\/span> \u0927\u0930\u0947\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0907\u0928\u094d\u0926\u094d\u0930<\/span> \u0915\u0943\u0937\u094d\u0923<\/span> \u0924\u0947\u0930\u0940<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0947<\/span> \u0906\u0930\u0924\u0940<\/span>, \u091a\u0945\u0935\u0930<\/span> \u0915\u0941\u092c\u0947\u0930<\/span> \u0921\u0941\u0932\u093e\u092f<\/span> \u0930\u0939\u0947\u0964\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u091c\u092f<\/span> \u091c\u0928\u0928\u0940<\/span> \u091c\u092f<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0924\u0941<\/span> \u092d\u0935\u093e\u0928\u0940<\/span> , \u0905\u091f\u0932<\/span> \u092d\u0935\u0928<\/span> \u092e\u0947<\/span> \u0930\u093e\u091c\u094d\u092f<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0947\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u0938\u0928\u094d\u0924\u0928<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u0924\u093f\u092a\u093e\u0932\u0940<\/span> \u0938\u0926\u093e<\/span> \u0916\u0941\u0936\u0939\u093e\u0932\u0940<\/span>, \u092e\u0948\u092f\u093e<\/span> \u091c\u0948<\/span> \u0915\u093e\u0932\u0940<\/span> \u0915\u0932\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0923<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0947\u0964<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"14","post_id":"14","lang_id":"2","post_title":"Kalimata ki Aarti ","post_desc":"

Mangal ki seva sunn meri deva haanth jod tere dwaar khade,<\/p>\n

Paan, supari, dhwjaa naariyal, le jwala tere bhet dhare,<\/p>\n

Sunn Jagdambe kar naa vilambe, santan ka bhndaar bhare,<\/p>\n

Santan pratipaali sada kushali, jai kaali kalyaan kare,<\/p>\n

Buddhi vidhata tu jagmaata, mera kaaraj siddh kare,<\/p>\n

Charan kamal ka liya aasra, sharan tumhaari aan pade,<\/p>\n

Jab- jab bhir padi bhagatan par, tab- tab aaye sahaye kare,<\/p>\n

Santan pratipaali sada kushali maiyaa, jai kaali kalyaan kare,<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Chir waar the sab jag mohyo, tarano roop anup dhare,<\/p>\n

Maata hokar putra khilawe, Maata hokar putra khilawe,<\/p>\n

kayi bhaarya bhog bhare,<\/p>\n

Thaari mahima kab lakh barti, koti- koti kalyaan kare,<\/p>\n

Santan pratipaali sada kushali maiyaa, jai kaali kalyaan kare,<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Santan sukhdayi sada sahayi, sant khade jai- jai kaar kare,<\/p>\n

Brahma, Mahesh sahastra fal liye, Brahma, Mahesh sahastra fal liye,<\/p>\n

Bhet ko tere dwaar khade,<\/p>\n

Atal singhashan baithi maata, sir sone ka chatar dhare,<\/p>\n

Santan pratipaali sada kushali maiyaa, jai kaali kalyaan kare,<\/p>\n

Waar sanichar kum- kum varani, jab lukand par hukum kare,<\/p>\n

Khadag khappr trishul haanth liye, khadag khappr trishul haanth liye,<\/p>\n

Raktbij ko bhasam kare,<\/p>\n

Sumbh- nisumbh ko chan mei mare, Mahishasur ko pakad dale,<\/p>\n

Santan pratipaali sada kushali maiyaa, jai kaali kalyaan kare,<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Aaditwar aadi ko veera, jan apne ko kasht hare,<\/p>\n

Kop hoyekar daanav maare, kop hoyekar daanav mare,<\/p>\n

Chand- mund sab chur kare,<\/p>\n

Jab tum dekho daya roop ho, pal mei sankat dur kare,<\/p>\n

Santan pratipaali sada kushali maiyaa, jai kaali kalyaan kare,<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Saumya swabhaav ghar yo maata, jinki araj Kabul kare,<\/p>\n

Singh pith par chadhi bhawaani, Singh pith par chadhi bhawaani,<\/p>\n

Atal bhawan mei raaj kare,<\/p>\n

Darshan paawe mangal gaawe, siddhi saadhu tera bhet dhare,<\/p>\n

Santan pratipaali sada kushali maiyaa, jai kaali kalyaan kare,<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Brahma ved pade tere dwaare, Shiv Shankar ji dhyan dhare,<\/p>\n

Indra, Krishna teri kare aarti, Indra, Krishna teri kare aarti,<\/p>\n

Charan Kuber dulaye rahe,<\/p>\n

Jai janani jai maatu bhawaani, atal bhawan mei raaj kare,<\/p>\n

Santan pratipaali sada kushali maiyaa, jai kaali kalyaan kare,<\/p>\n

Shri Hanuman Chalisa<\/span><\/strong><\/p>\n

\u0965<\/span>Doha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Shri Guru Charan Saroj Raj, Nij manu Mukuru Sudhaari\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Barnau Raghubar Bimal Jasu, Jo Daayeku Phal Chaari\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Buddhiheen Tanu Jaanike, Sumirau Pavan-Kumaar\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Bal Buddhi Bidya Dehu Mohi, Harahu Kales Bikaar\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0965<\/span>Chaupai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Hanuman Gyaan Gun Sagar\u0964<\/span> Jai Kapis Teehun Lok Ujagar\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Ram Doot Atulit Bal Dhama\u0964<\/span> Anjani-Putra Pavansut Nama\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Mahabir Bikram Bajrangi\u0964<\/span> Kumati Nivaar Sumati Ke Sangi\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Kanchan Baran Biraaj Subesa\u0964<\/span> Kaanan Kundal Kunchit Kesa\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Haath Bajra Aau Dhwaja Biraaje\u0964<\/span> Kaandhe Moonj Janeu Saaje\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Sankar Suvan Kesarinandan\u0964<\/span> Tej Prataap Maha Jag Bandan\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Bidyabaan Guni Ati Chaatur\u0964<\/span> Ram Kaaj Karibe Ko Aatur\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Prabhu Charitra Sunibe Ko Rasiya\u0964<\/span> Ram Lakhan Sita Man Basiya\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Sukshma Roop Dhari Siyahin Dikhawa\u0964<\/span> Bikat Roop Dhari Lanka Jarawa\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Bheem Roop Dhari Asur Sanhaare\u0964<\/span> Ramchandra Ke Kaaj Sanwaare\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Laaye Sajivan Lakhan Jiyaaye\u0964<\/span> Shri Raghubeer Harashi Ur Laaye\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Raghupati Keenhi Bahut Badai\u0964<\/span> Tum Mum Priy Bharat Hi Sam Bhai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Sahas Badan Tumhro Jas Gaavein\u0964<\/span> As Kahi Shripati Kanth Lagavein\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Sankadik Bramhadi Munisa\u0964<\/span> Narad Sarad Sahit Ahisa\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jam Kuber Digpaal Jahan Te\u0964<\/span> Kabi Kobid Kahi Sake Kahaan Te\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Tum Upkaar Sugreevhin Kinha\u0964<\/span> Ram Milaaye Raajpad Dinha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Tumhro Mantra Vibhishan Maana\u0964<\/span> Lankeswar Bhaye Sab Jag Jana\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jug Sahastra Jojan Par Bhaanu\u0964<\/span> Lilyo Taahi Madhur Phal Jaanu\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Prabhu Mudrika Meli Mukh Maahi\u0964<\/span> Jaldhi Laanghi Gaye Achraj Naahi\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Durgam Kaaj Jagat Ke Jete\u0964<\/span> Sugam Anugraha Tumhre Tete\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Ram Dooare Tum Rakhwaare\u0964<\/span> Hoat Na Aagya Binu Paisare\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Sab Sukh Lahai Tumhari Sarna\u0964<\/span> Tum Rakhshak Kaahu Ko Darna\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Aapan Tej Samharo Aapai\u0964<\/span> Teeno Lok Haank Te Kaanpen\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Bhoot Pisaach Nikat Nahi Aave\u0964<\/span> Mahabir Jab Naam Sunave\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Naasai Rog Harai Sab Peera\u0964<\/span> Japat Nirantar Hanumat Beera\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Sankat Te Hanuman Chhoodave\u0964<\/span> Man Krama Bachan Dhyaan Jo Laave\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Sab Par Raam Tapasvi Raja\u0964<\/span> Tin Ke Kaaj Sakal Tum Saaja\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Aur Manorath Jo Koi Laave\u0964<\/span> Soi Amit Jivan Phal Paave\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Chaaro Jug Partaap Tumhara\u0964<\/span> Hai Parsiddh Jagat Ujiyara\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Saadhu Sant Ke Tum Rakhwaare\u0964<\/span> Asur Nikandan Ram Dulaare\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Asht Siddhi Nau Nidhi Ke Daata\u0964<\/span> As bar Deen Janki Maata\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Ram Rasayan Tumhre Paasa\u0964<\/span> Sada Raho Raghupati Ke Daasa\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Tumhre Bhajan Ram Ko Paave\u0964<\/span> Janam Janam Ke Dukh Bisraave\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Antakaal Raghubar Pur Jaayee\u0964<\/span> Jahan Janam Hari-Bhakt Kahayee\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Aur Devta Chitt Na Dharayi\u0964<\/span> Hanumat Sei Sarb Sukh Karayi\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Sankat Kate Mite Sab Peera\u0964<\/span> Jo Sumirai Hanumat Balbira\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Jai Jai Hanuman Gosaai\u0964<\/span> Kripa Karahun Gurudev Ki Naai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jo Sat Baar Paath Kar Koi\u0964<\/span> Chhootahin Bandi Maha sukh Hoyi\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jo Yeh Padhe Hanuman Chalisa\u0964<\/span> Hoye Siddhi Saakhi Gaurisa\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Tulsidas Sada Harichera\u0964<\/span> Kije Naath Hridaya Mahn Dera\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0965<\/span>Doha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Pavantanaye Sankat Haran, Mangal Moorti Roop\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Ram Lakhan Sita Sahit Hridaya Basahu Soor Bhoop\u0965<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"18","post_id":"22","lang_id":"2","post_title":"AARTI KUNJ BIHARI KI","post_desc":"

Aarti Kunj Bihari Ki<\/p>\n

Shri Girdhar Krishna Murari Ki<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Gale Mein Baijanti Mala, Bajave Murali Madhur Bala<\/p>\n

Shravan Mein Kundal Jhalakala, Nand Ke Anand Nandlala<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Gagan Sam Ang Kanti Kali, Radhika Chamak Rahi Aali<\/p>\n

Latan Mein Thadhe Banamali<\/p>\n

Bhramar Si Alak, Kasturi Tilak, Chandra Si Jhalak<\/p>\n

Lalit Chavi Shyama Pyari Ki<\/p>\n

Shri Giradhar Krishnamuraari Ki<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Aarti Kunj Bihari Ki<\/p>\n

Shri Girdhar Krishna Murari Ki ||<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Kanakmay Mor Mukut Bilse, Devata Darsan Ko Tarse<\/p>\n

Gagan So Suman Raasi Barse<\/p>\n

Baje Murchang, Madhur Mridang, Gwaalin Sang<\/p>\n

Atual Rati Gop Kumaari Ki<\/p>\n

Shri Giradhar Krishna Murari Ki<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Aarti Kunj Bihari Ki<\/p>\n

Shri Girdhar Krishna Murari Ki ||<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jahaan Te Pragat Bhayi Ganga, Kalush Kali Haarini Shri Ganga,<\/p>\n

Smaran Te Hot Moh Bhanga<\/p>\n

Basi Shiv Shish, Jataa Ke Biich, Harei Agh Kiich;<\/p>\n

Charan Chhavi Shri Banvaari Ki.<\/p>\n

Shri Giradhar Krishnamuraari Ki…<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Aarti Kunj Bihari Ki<\/p>\n

Shri Girdhar Krishna Murari Ki ||<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Chamakati Ujjawal Tat Renu, Baj Rahi Vrindavan Benu<\/p>\n

Chahu Disi Gopi Gwaal Dhenu<\/p>\n

Hansat Mridu Mand, Chandani Chandra, Katat Bhav Phand<\/p>\n

Ter Sun Diin Bhikhaarii Kii<\/p>\n

Shri Giradhar Krishnamuraari Ki<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Aarti Kunj Bihari Ki<\/p>\n

Om Jai Lakshmi Mata, Maiya Jai Lakshmi Mata<\/p>\n

Tumko Nis Din Shewat, Har Vishnu Dhata<\/p>\n

Om Jai Lakshmi Mata…<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Uma Rama Brahmani, Tumhi Jag Mata<\/p>\n

Surya Chandrama Dhyavat, Narad Rishi Gata<\/p>\n

Om Jai Lakshmi Mata…<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Durga Roop Niranjani, Sukh Sampati Data<\/p>\n

Jo Koi Tumko Dhyawat, Riddhi Siddhi Dhan Pata<\/p>\n

Om Jai Lakshmi Mata…<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Tum Patal ki Vasini, Tum hi Shubh Data<\/p>\n

Karma Prabhava prakashini, Jag nidhi Ki Trata<\/p>\n

Om Jai Lakshmi Mata…<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jis Ghar me Tum Rahti, Sab Sadguna Ata<\/p>\n

Sab Sambhav ho jata, maan nahi ghabrata<\/p>\n

Om Jai Lakshmi Mata…<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Tum Bin yagya na howe, vastra na koi pata<\/p>\n

Khan paan ka vaibhav, sab tumse ata<\/p>\n

Om jai Lakshmi Mata…<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Shubh Guna Mandir Sunder, Kshirodadhi jata<\/p>\n

Ratna Chaturdas tum bin, koi nahin pata<\/p>\n

Om Jai Lakshmi Mata…<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Maha Lakshmiji ki Aarti, jo koi jan gata<\/p>\n

Ur Anand Samata, paap Utar jata<\/p>\n

Om jai lakshmi Mata…<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Om Jai Lakshmi Mata, Maiya Jai Lakshmi Mata<\/p>\n

Tumko Nis Din Shewat, Har Vishnu Dhata<\/p>\n

Om Jai Lakshmi Mata…<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"23","post_id":"27","lang_id":"2","post_title":"Bajrang Baan","post_desc":"

\u0965Doha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Nishchaya Prema Pratiti Te, Binaya Karai Sanamana\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Tehi Ke Karaja Sakala Shubha, Siddha Karai Hanuman\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0965Chaupai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jaya Hanumanta Santa Hitakari\u0964 Suni Lijai Prabhu Araja Hamari\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jan Ke Kaja Vilamba Na Kijai\u0964 Atura Dauri Maha Sukha Dijai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jaise Kudi Sindhu Wahi Para\u0964 Surasa Badana Paithi Bistara\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Age Jaya Lankini Roka\u0964 Marehu Lata Gai Sura Loka\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jaya Vibhishana Ko Sukha Dinha\u0964 Sita Nirakhi Parama Pada Linha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Baga Ujari Sindhu Maham Bora\u0964 Ati Atura Yama Katara Tora\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Akshaya Kumara Mari Sanhara\u0964 Luma Lapeti Lanka Ko Jara\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Laha Samana Lanka Jari Gai\u0964 Jaya Jaya Dhuni Sura Pura Maham Bhai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Aba Vilamba Kehi Karana Swami\u0964 Kripa Karahun Ura Antaryami\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jaya Jaya Lakshmana Prana Ke Data\u0964 Atura Hoi Dukha Karahun Nipata\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Giridhara Jai Jai Sukha Sagara\u0964 Sura Samuha Samaratha Bhatanagara\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Om Hanu Hanu Hanu Hanu Hanumanta Hathile\u0964 Bairihin Maru Bajra Ki Kile\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Gada Bajra Lai Bairihin Maro\u0964 Maharaja Prabhu Dasa Ubaro\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Omkara Hunkara Mahaprabhu Dhavo\u0964 Bajra Gada Hanu Vilamba Na Lavo\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Om Hrim Hrim Hrim Hanumanta Kapisa\u0964 Om Hum Hum Hum Hanu Ari Ura Shisha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Satya Hou Hari Shapatha Payake\u0964 Ramaduta Dharu Maru Dhaya Ke\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jaya Jaya Jaya Hanumanta Agadha\u0964 Dukha Pavata Jana Kehi Aparadha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Puja Japa Tapa Nema Achara\u0964 Nahin Janata Kachhu Dasa Tumhara\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Vana Upavana Maga Giri Griha Mahin\u0964 Tumare Bala Hama Darapata Nahin\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Paya Paraun Kara Jori Manavon\u0964 Yaha Avasara Aba Kehi Goharavon\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jaya Anjani Kumara Balavanta\u0964 Shankara Suvana Dhira Hanumanta\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Badana Karala Kala Kula Ghalaka\u0964 Rama Sahaya Sada Pratipalaka\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Bhuta Preta Pishacha Nishachara\u0964 Agni Baitala Kala Marimara\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Inhen Maru Tohi Shapatha Rama Ki\u0964 Rakhu Natha Marajada Nama Ki\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Janakasuta Hari Dasa Kahavo\u0964 Taki Shapatha Vilamba Na Lavo\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Jai Jai Dhuni Hota Akasha\u0964 Sumirata Hota Dusaha Dukha Nasha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Charana Sharana Kari Jori Manavon\u0964 Yahi Avasara Aba Kehi Goharavon\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Uthu Uthu Chalu Tohin Rama Duhai\u0964 Panya Paraun Kara Jori Manai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Om Chan Chan Chan Chan Chapala Chalanta\u0964 Om Hanu Hanu Hanu Hanu Hanumanta\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Om Han Han Hanka Deta Kapi Chanchala\u0964 Om San San Sahama Parane Khala Dala\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Apane Jana Ko Turata Ubaro\u0964 Sumirata Hoya Ananda Hamaro\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Yahi Bajrang Baan Jehi Maro\u0964 Tahi Kaho Phira Kauna Ubaro\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Patha Karai Bajrang Baan Ki\u0964 Hanumata Raksha Karai Prana Ki\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Yaha Bajrang Baan Jo Japai\u0964 Tehi Te Bhuta Preta Saba Kampe\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Dhupa Deya Aru Japai Hamesha\u0964 Take Tana Nahin Rahe Kalesha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0965Doha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Prema Pratitin Kapi Bhajai, Sada Dharai Ura Dhyana\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092a\u093e\u0920<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0948<\/span> \u092c\u091c\u0930\u0902\u0917<\/span> \u092c\u093e\u0923<\/span> \u0915\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u0939\u0928\u0941\u092e\u0924<\/span> \u0930\u0915\u094d\u0937\u093e<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0948<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0923<\/span> \u0915\u0940\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0965<\/span>Doha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jaya Ganapati Sadhguna Sadana, Kavi Vara Badana Kripaala\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Vighna Harana Mangala Karana, Jaya Jaya Girijaa Laala\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0965<\/span>Chaupai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jaya Jaya Ganapati Gan Raaju\u0964<\/span> Mangala Bharana Karana Shubha Kaaju\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jaya Gajabadana Sadana Sukhadaataa\u0964<\/span> Vishva Vinaayaka Buddhi Vidhaata\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Vakra Tunda Shuchi Shunda Suhaavana\u0964<\/span> Tilaka Tripunda Bhaala Mana Bhaavana\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Raajata Mani Muktana Ura Maala\u0964<\/span> Svarna Mukuta Shira Nayana Vishaala\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Pustaka Paani Kuthaara Trishoolam\u0964<\/span> Modaka Bhoga Sugandhita Phoolam\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Sundara Pitaambara Tana Saajita\u0964<\/span> Charana Paaduka Muni Mana Raajita\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Dhani Shiva Suvana Shadaanana Bhraata\u0964<\/span> Gauri Lalana Vishva-Vidhaata\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Riddhi Siddhi Tava Chanvara Sudhaare\u0964<\/span> Mushaka Vaahana Sohata Dvaare\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Kahaun Janma Shubha Kathaa Tumhaari\u0964<\/span> Ati Shuchi Paavana Mangala Kaari\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Eka Samaya Giriraaj Kumaari\u0964<\/span> Putra Hetu Tapa Kinha Bhaari\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Bhayo Yagya Jaba Poorna Anoopa\u0964<\/span> Taba Pahunchyo Tuma Dhari Dvija Roopa\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Atithi Jaani Kai Gauri Sukhaari\u0964<\/span> Bahuvidhi Sevaa Kari Tumhaari\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Ati Prasanna Hvai Tuma Vara Dinha\u0964<\/span> Maatu Putra Hita Jo Tapa Kinha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Milahi Putra Tuhi Buddhi Vishaala\u0964<\/span> Binaa Garbha Dhaarana Yahi Kaala\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Gananaayaka, Guna Gyaana Nidhaana\u0964<\/span> Poojita Prathama Roopa Bhagavana\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Asa Kahi Antardhyaana Roopa Hvai\u0964<\/span> Palana Para Baalaka Svaroopa Hvai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Bani Shishu Rudana Jabahi Tuma Thaana\u0964<\/span> Lakhi Mukha Sukha Nahin Gauri Samaan\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Sakala Magana, Sukha Mangala Gaavahin\u0964<\/span> Nabha Te Surana Sumana Varshaavahin\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Shambhu Uma, Bahu Dana Lutavahin\u0964<\/span> Sura Munijana, Suta Dekhana Aavahin\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Lakhi Ati Aananda Mangala Saaja\u0964<\/span> Dekhana Bhi Aaye Shani Raaja\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Nija Avaguna Guni Shani Mana Maahin\u0964<\/span> Baalaka, Dekhan Chaahata Naahin\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Giraja Kachhu Mana Bheda Badhaayo\u0964<\/span> Utsava Mora Na Shani Tuhi Bhaayo\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Kahana Lage Shani, Mana Sakuchaai\u0964<\/span> Kaa Karihau, Shishu Mohi Dikhaai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Nahin Vishvaasa, Uma Ur Bhayau, Shani So Baalaka Dekhana Kahyau\u0964<\/span> \u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Padatahin, Shani Driga Kona Prakaasha\u0964<\/span> Baalaka Shira Udi Gayo Aakaasha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Giraja Girin Vikala Hvai Dharani\u0964<\/span> So Dukha Dasha Gayo Nahin Varani\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Haahaakaara Machyo Kailaasha\u0964<\/span> Shani Kinhyon Lakhi Suta Ka Naasha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Turata Garuda Chadhi Vishnu Sidhaaye\u0964<\/span> Kaati Chakra So Gaja Shira Laaye\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Baalaka Ke Dhada Upara Dhaarayo\u0964<\/span> Praana, Mantra Padha Shankara Darayo\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Naama 'Ganesha' Shambhu Taba Kinhe\u0964<\/span> Prathama Poojya Buddhi Nidhi, Vara Dinhe\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Buddhi Pariksha Jaba Shiva Kinha\u0964<\/span> Prithvi Kar Pradakshina Linha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Chale Shadaanana, Bharami Bhulaii\u0964<\/span> Rachi Baitha Tuma Buddhi Upaai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Charana Maatu-Pitu Ke Dhara Linhen\u0964<\/span> Tinake Saata Pradakshina Kinhen\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Dhani Ganesha, Kahi Shiva Hiya Harashe\u0964<\/span> Nabha Te Surana Sumana Bahu Barase\u0965\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Tumhari Mahima Buddhi Badaye\u0964<\/span> Shesha Sahasa Mukha Sakai Na Gaai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Mein Mati Hina Malina Dukhaari\u0964<\/span> Karahun Kauna Vidhi Vinaya Tumhaari\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Bhajata 'Raamasundara' Prabhudaasa\u0964<\/span> Lakha Prayaga, Kakara, Durvasa\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Aba Prabhu Daya Dina Para Kijai\u0964<\/span> Apani Bhakti Shakti Kuchhu Dijai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0965<\/span>Doha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Shri Ganesh Yah Chalisa, Path Karai Dhari Dhyan\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Nit Nav Mangal Gruha Bashe, Lahi Jagat Sanman\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Sambandh Apne Sahstra Dash, Rushi Panchami Dinesh\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Puran Chalisa Bhayo, Mangal Murti Ganesha<\/span>\u0965<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"28","post_id":"32","lang_id":"2","post_title":"Lord Vishnu Aarti ","post_desc":"

Om jai Jagdish hare, Swami jai Jagdish hare,<\/p>\n

Bhakt jano ke sankat Dass jano ke sankat, Kshan mein door kare,<\/p>\n

Om jai Jagdish hare...<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jo dhyave phal pave, Dukh bin se mun ka, Swami dukh bin se mun ka<\/p>\n

Sukh sampati ghar aave, Kasht mite tun ka,<\/p>\n

Om jai Jagdish hare...<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Maat pita tum mere, Sharan gahu mein kiski, Swami sharan gaho kiski<\/p>\n

Tum bin aur na dooja, Aas karun mein jiski,<\/p>\n

Om jai Jagdish hare<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Tum puran Parmatma,Tum Antaryami, Swami tum Antaryami<\/p>\n

Par Braham Parmeshwar, Tum sabke swami,<\/p>\n

Om jai Jagdish hare<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Tum karuna ke sagar, Tum palan karta, Swami tum palan karta<\/p>\n

Mein sevak tum swami, Kripa karo Bharta,<\/p>\n

Om jai Jagdish hare<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Tum ho ek agochar, Sab ke pranpati,Swami sab ke pranpati<\/p>\n

Kis vidh milun Dyamaye, Tum ko main kumti,<\/p>\n

Om jai Jagdish hare<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Deen bandhu dukh harta, Tum rakshak mere,<\/p>\n

Apne haath uthao, Dwar pada tere,<\/p>\n

Om jai Jagdish hare<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Vishay vikar mitao, Paap haro Deva,<\/p>\n

Shradha bhakti badao, Shradha prem badao, Santan ki seva,<\/p>\n

Om jai Jagdish hare<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"29","post_id":"33","lang_id":"1","post_title":"\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940 \u0917\u0923\u0947\u0936 \u091a\u093e\u0932\u0940\u0938\u093e","post_desc":"

\u091a\u0932\u0947<\/span> \u0937\u0921\u093e\u0928\u0928<\/span>, \u092d\u0930\u092e\u093f<\/span> \u092d\u0941\u0932\u093e\u0908\u0964<\/span> \u0930\u091a\u0947<\/span> \u092c\u0948\u0920<\/span> \u0924\u0941\u092e<\/span> \u092c\u0941\u0926\u094d\u0927\u093f<\/span> \u0909\u092a\u093e\u0908\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092a\u0942\u0930\u0923<\/span> \u091a\u093e\u0932\u0940\u0938\u093e<\/span> \u092d\u092f\u094b<\/span>, \u092e\u0902\u0917\u0932<\/span> \u092e\u0942\u0930\u094d\u0924\u0940<\/span> \u0917\u0923\u0947\u0936\u0965<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"30","post_id":"34","lang_id":"1","post_title":"\u0935\u093f\u0937\u094d\u0923\u0941 \u092d\u0917\u0935\u093e\u0928 \u091c\u0940 \u0915\u0940 \u0906\u0930\u0924\u0940","post_desc":"

\u0935\u093f\u0936\u094d\u0935\u094b\u0924\u094d\u092a\u093e\u0926\u0915<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0932\u0915<\/span> \u0930\u0915\u094d\u0937\u0915<\/span> \u0938\u0902\u0939\u0930\u094d\u0924\u093e\u0965 \u0950<\/span> \u091c\u092f<\/span> \u091c\u0917\u0926\u0940\u0936<\/span> \u0939\u0930\u0947<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0938\u093e\u0915\u094d\u0937\u0940<\/span>, \u0936\u0930\u0923<\/span>, \u0938\u0916\u093e<\/span>, \u092a\u094d\u0930\u093f\u092f<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u093f\u092f\u0924\u092e<\/span>, \u092a\u0942\u0930\u094d\u0923<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u092d\u094b\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0915\u0947\u0935\u0932<\/span>-\u0915\u093e\u0932<\/span> \u0915\u0932\u093e\u0928\u093f\u0927\u093f<\/span>, \u0915\u093e\u0932\u093e\u0924\u0940\u0924<\/span>, \u0935\u093f\u092d\u094b\u0965<\/span> \u0950 \u091c\u092f<\/span> \u091c\u0917\u0926\u0940\u0936<\/span> \u0939\u0930\u0947<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u0930\u093e\u092e<\/span>-\u0915\u0943\u0937\u094d\u0923<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0941\u0923\u093e\u092e\u092f<\/span>, \u092a\u094d\u0930\u0947\u092e\u093e\u092e\u0943\u0924<\/span>-\u0938\u093e\u0917\u0930\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092e\u0928<\/span>-\u092e\u094b\u0939\u0928<\/span> \u092e\u0941\u0930\u0932\u0940\u0927\u0930<\/span> \u0928\u093f\u0924<\/span>-\u0928\u0935<\/span> \u0928\u091f\u0928\u093e\u0917\u0930\u0965<\/span> \u0950 \u091c\u092f<\/span> \u091c\u0917\u0926\u0940\u0936<\/span> \u0939\u0930\u0947<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u0938\u092c<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u0927\u093f<\/span>-\u0939\u0940\u0928<\/span>, \u092e\u0932\u093f\u0928<\/span>-\u092e\u0924\u093f<\/span>, \u0939\u092e<\/span> \u0905\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0924\u0915\u093f<\/span>-\u091c\u0928\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092a\u094d\u0930\u092d\u0941\u092a\u0926<\/span>-\u0935\u093f\u092e\u0941\u0916<\/span> \u0905\u092d\u093e\u0917\u0940<\/span>, \u0915\u0932\u093f<\/span>-\u0915\u0932\u0941\u0937\u093f\u0924<\/span> \u0924\u0928<\/span> \u092e\u0928\u0965 \u0950<\/span> \u091c\u092f<\/span> \u091c\u0917\u0926\u0940\u0936<\/span> \u0939\u0930\u0947<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u0906\u0936\u094d\u0930\u092f<\/span>-\u0926\u093e\u0928<\/span> \u0926\u092f\u093e\u0930\u094d\u0923\u0935<\/span>! \u0939\u092e<\/span> \u0938\u092c\u0915\u094b<\/span> \u0926\u0940\u091c\u0948\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092d\u0915\u094d\u0924<\/span> \u092d\u0917\u0940\u0930\u0925<\/span> \u0915\u0940<\/span> \u0930\u0941\u091a\u093f<\/span> \u0930\u093e\u0916\u0940\u0964<\/span>

\u0930\u0941\u0930\u0941<\/span> \u0905\u0917\u0938\u094d\u0924\u094d\u092f<\/span> \u0909\u092a\u092e\u0928\u094d\u092f\u0942<\/span> \u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0928\u0940\u0964<\/span>

\u0917\u0928\u094c<\/span> \u0928<\/span> \u0905\u0918<\/span>, \u0905\u0918<\/span>-\u091c\u093e\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u0915\u091b\u0941<\/span>, \u0938\u092c<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u0927\u093f<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u094b<\/span> \u0938\u0901\u092d\u093e\u0930\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0926\u0940\u0928<\/span>-\u0939\u0940\u0928<\/span> \u0905\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u092e\u0932\u093f\u0928<\/span> \u092e\u0924\u093f<\/span>, \u092e\u0948\u0902<\/span> \u0905\u0918<\/span>-\u0913\u0918<\/span> \u0905\u092a\u093e\u0930\u0964<\/span>

\u0915\u0943\u092a\u093e<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0927\u093e<\/span> \u092c\u0930\u0938\u093e\u092f<\/span> \u092a\u0941\u0928\u093f<\/span>, \u0936\u0940\u0924\u0932<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u094b<\/span> \u092a\u0935\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0930\u0964<\/span>
\u0930\u093e\u0916\u094b<\/span> \u092a\u0926\u0915\u092e\u0932\u0928\u093f<\/span> \u0938\u0926\u093e<\/span>, \u0939\u0947<\/span> \u0915\u0941\u092a\u093e\u0924\u094d\u0930<\/span> \u0915\u0947<\/span> \u092e\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0930\u0965<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"33","post_id":"37","lang_id":"2","post_title":"Shiv Chalisa","post_desc":"

DOHA:<\/p>\n

Jai Ganesh Girija suvan, Mangal mul sujan<\/p>\n

Kahit Ayodhya das tum, dev abhay vardan<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jai Girijapati din dayala, sada karat santan pritpala.<\/p>\n

Bhol chahdrama sohat nike, kanan kundal nag phani ke.<\/p>\n

Ang gaur, shir gangabanae, mundamal tan chhar lagae.<\/p>\n

Vastra khal bagambar sohe, chhavi ko dekh nag muni mohe.<\/p>\n

Maina matu ki havai dulari, bam ang sohat chhavi niyari<\/p>\n

Kar men trishul sohat chhavi bhari karai sada shatrun shahkari<\/p>\n

Nandi Ganesh sohain tahan kaise, sagar madhya kamal hai jaise.<\/p>\n

Kartik shyam aur ganarau, ya chhavi ko kahi jat na kau.<\/p>\n

Devani jab hi ai pukara, tabahin dukh Prabhu ap nivara.<\/p>\n

Kiya upadrav Tarak bhari, devani sab mili turnahin juhari.<\/p>\n

Turant shadanan ap pathayo, lay nimesh mahin mari girayo.<\/p>\n

Ap jaladhar asur sanhara, suyash tumhara vidit sansara.<\/p>\n

Tripurasur sang yudh machai, sabahin kripa kari linh bachai.<\/p>\n

Kiya tapahin Bhagirath bhari, purve pratigya tasu purari.<\/p>\n

Davan manan tum sam kou nahin, sevak ustuti karat sadai.<\/p>\n

Ved nam mahima tab gai, akath anadi bhed nahin pai<\/p>\n

Pragateu dadi-manthan te jvala, jare surasur bahe bihala.<\/p>\n

Dindayal tahan kari sahai, Nilkanth tab nam kahai.<\/p>\n

Pujan Ramchandra jab kinha, jit ke Lanka Vibhishan dinha.<\/p>\n

Sahas kamal men ho rahe dhari, kinha pariksha tabahi purari<\/p>\n

Ek kamal prabhu rakhyau gohi, kamal nayan pujan chahan soi<\/p>\n

Kathin bhakti dekhi Prabhu Shankar, bhaye prasan diye ichhatvar.<\/p>\n

Jai Jai Jai Anant avinasi, karat kripa sab ke ghat vasi<\/p>\n

Dushat sakal nit mohi satavaen, bhramat rahe mohi chain na avaen.<\/p>\n

Trahi trahi main nath pukarun, yahi avasari mohi, ani ubaro.<\/p>\n

Lai trishul shatruni ko maro, sankat se mohe ani ubaro.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Mata pita bhrata sab hoi, sankat men puchhat nahin koi.<\/p>\n

Svarmi ek hai as tumhari, ai haranu ab sankat bhari<\/p>\n

Dhan nirdhan ko det sadai, jo koi jancha so phal pahin.<\/p>\n

Ustuti kehi vidhi karaun tumhari, shamahu nath ab chuk hamari<\/p>\n

Shahkar ho sankat ke nashan, vighna vinashan mangal karan.<\/p>\n

Yogi yati muni dhyan lagavain, sharad Narad shish nivavain.<\/p>\n

Namo, namo jai namo Shivaye, sur Brahmadik par na paye.<\/p>\n

Jo yah path kare man lai, tapar hot hain Shambhu sahai.<\/p>\n

Rinya jo koi ho adhikari, path kare so pavan-hari<\/p>\n

Putra ho na ichchha kari koi, nishchai Shiv prasad te hoi<\/p>\n

Pandit triyodashi ko lavain, dhyan purvak horn karavain.<\/p>\n

Tryodashi vrita kare hamesh, tan nahin take rahe kalesh.<\/p>\n

Dhup dip naived chadhavai, Shankar sanmukh path sunavai.<\/p>\n

Janam Janam ke pap nashavai, ahtvas Shivpur men pavai.<\/p>\n

Kahe Ayodhya as tumhari, jan sakal dukh harahu hamari.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

DOHA:<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Nitya Nema kari Pratahi<\/p>\n

Patha karau Chalis<\/p>\n

Tum Meri Man Kamana<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Purna Karahu Jagadish<\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"34","post_id":"38","lang_id":"2","post_title":"Ravivar (Sunday) Aarti","post_desc":"

Sakal Jagat Jaaki Joti Viraaje.<\/p>\n

Saat Samundra Jaake Charni Basey, Kaha Bhayo Jal Kumbh Bhare. Ho Ram..<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Koti Bhanu Jaake Nakh Ki Shobha, Kaha Bhayo Mandir Deep Dhare. Ho Ram..<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Bhaar Athaareh Romavali Jaake,<\/p>\n

Kaha Bhayo Shir Pushp Dhare. Ho Ram..<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Chappan Bhog Jake Pratidin Laage,<\/p>\n

Kaha Bhayo Nevadya Dhare Ho Ram. Amit Koti Jake Baaja Baaje, Kaha Bhayo Jhankaar Kare. Ho Ram..<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Chaar Ved Jake Mukh Ki Shobha,<\/p>\n

Kaha Bhayo Brahmdev Padhe. Ho Ram..<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Shiv Sankadik Aadhi Bramhadik,<\/p>\n

Naarad Muni Jake Dhyan Dhare. Ho Ram..<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Him Mandaar Jako Pawan Jhakore, Kaha Bhayo Shir Chanvar Dhure Ho Ram.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Lakh Chorasi Fandh Chuddaaye,<\/p>\n

Keval Hariyash Naamdev Gaaye.Ho Ram.<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"35","post_id":"39","lang_id":"1","post_title":"\u0930\u0935\u093f\u0935\u093e\u0930 (\u0907\u0924\u0935\u093e\u0930) \u0935\u094d\u0930\u0924 \u0915\u0940 \u0906\u0930\u0924\u0940","post_desc":"

\u0965\u0926\u094b\u0939\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u092f<\/span> \u0917\u0923\u0947\u0936<\/span> \u0917\u093f\u0930\u093f\u091c\u093e<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0935\u0928<\/span>, \u092e\u0902\u0917\u0932<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0923<\/span> \u0915\u0943\u092a\u093e\u0932\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0926\u0940\u0928\u0928<\/span> \u0915\u0947<\/span> \u0926\u0941\u0903\u0916<\/span> \u0926\u0942\u0930<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u093f<\/span>, \u0915\u0940\u091c\u0948<\/span> \u0928\u093e\u0925<\/span> \u0928\u093f\u0939\u093e\u0932\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u092f<\/span> \u091c\u092f<\/span> \u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940<\/span> \u0936\u0928\u093f\u0926\u0947\u0935<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u092d\u0941<\/span>, \u0938\u0941\u0928\u0939\u0941<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u0928\u092f<\/span> \u092e\u0939\u093e\u0930\u093e\u091c\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0915\u0930\u0939\u0941<\/span> \u0915\u0943\u092a\u093e<\/span> \u0939\u0947<\/span> \u0930\u0935\u093f<\/span> \u0924\u0928\u092f<\/span>, \u0930\u093e\u0916\u0939\u0941<\/span> \u091c\u0928<\/span> \u0915\u0940<\/span> \u0932\u093e\u091c\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0965\u091a\u094c\u092a\u093e\u0908\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u092f\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u091c\u092f\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u0936\u0928\u093f\u0926\u0947\u0935<\/span> \u0926\u092f\u093e\u0932\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0924<\/span> \u0938\u0926\u093e<\/span> \u092d\u0915\u094d\u0924\u0928<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u0924\u093f\u092a\u093e\u0932\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091a\u093e\u0930\u093f<\/span> \u092d\u0941\u091c\u093e<\/span>, \u0924\u0928\u0941<\/span> \u0936\u094d\u092f\u093e\u092e<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u0930\u093e\u091c\u0948\u0964<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0925\u0947<\/span> \u0930\u0924\u0928<\/span> \u092e\u0941\u0915\u0941\u091f<\/span> \u091b\u0935\u093f<\/span> \u091b\u093e\u091c\u0948\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092a\u0930\u092e<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u0936\u093e\u0932<\/span> \u092e\u0928\u094b\u0939\u0930<\/span> \u092d\u093e\u0932\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u091f\u0947\u095d\u0940<\/span> \u0926\u0943\u0937\u094d\u091f\u093f<\/span> \u092d\u0943\u0915\u0941\u091f\u093f<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u0915\u0930\u093e\u0932\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0915\u0941\u0923\u094d\u0921\u0932<\/span> \u0936\u094d\u0930\u0935\u0923<\/span> \u091a\u092e\u093e\u091a\u092e<\/span> \u091a\u092e\u0915\u0947\u0964<\/span> \u0939\u093f\u092f\u0947<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0932<\/span> \u092e\u0941\u0915\u094d\u0924\u0928<\/span> \u092e\u0923\u093f<\/span> \u0926\u092e\u0915\u0947\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0915\u0930<\/span> \u092e\u0947\u0902<\/span> \u0917\u0926\u093e<\/span> \u0924\u094d\u0930\u093f\u0936\u0942\u0932<\/span> \u0915\u0941\u0920\u093e\u0930\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u092a\u0932<\/span> \u092c\u093f\u091a<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0948\u0902<\/span> \u0905\u0930\u093f\u0939\u093f\u0902<\/span> \u0938\u0902\u0939\u093e\u0930\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092a\u093f\u0902\u0917\u0932<\/span>, \u0915\u0943\u0937\u094d\u0923\u094b\u0902<\/span>, \u091b\u093e\u092f\u093e<\/span>, \u0928\u0928\u094d\u0926\u0928\u0964<\/span> \u092f\u092e<\/span>, \u0915\u094b\u0923\u0938\u094d\u0925<\/span>, \u0930\u094c\u0926\u094d\u0930<\/span>, \u0926\u0941\u0903\u0916<\/span> \u092d\u0902\u091c\u0928\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0938\u094c\u0930\u0940<\/span>, \u092e\u0928\u094d\u0926<\/span>, \u0936\u0928\u093f<\/span>, \u0926\u0936\u0928\u093e\u092e\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u092d\u093e\u0928\u0941<\/span> \u092a\u0941\u0924\u094d\u0930<\/span> \u092a\u0942\u091c\u0939\u093f\u0902<\/span> \u0938\u092c<\/span> \u0915\u093e\u092e\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u093e<\/span> \u092a\u0930<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u092d\u0941<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u0938\u0928\u094d\u0928<\/span> \u0939\u0948<\/span> \u091c\u093e\u0939\u0940\u0902\u0964<\/span> \u0930\u0902\u0915\u0939\u0941\u0902<\/span> \u0930\u093e\u0935<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0948\u0902<\/span> \u0915\u094d\u0937\u0923<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0939\u0940\u0902\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092a\u0930\u094d\u0935\u0924\u0939\u0942<\/span> \u0924\u0943\u0923<\/span> \u0939\u094b\u0908<\/span> \u0928\u093f\u0939\u093e\u0930\u0924\u0964<\/span> \u0924\u0943\u0923\u0939\u0942<\/span> \u0915\u094b<\/span> \u092a\u0930\u094d\u0935\u0924<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u093f<\/span> \u0921\u093e\u0930\u0924\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0930\u093e\u091c<\/span> \u092e\u093f\u0932\u0924<\/span> \u0935\u0928<\/span> \u0930\u093e\u092e\u0939\u093f\u0902<\/span> \u0926\u0940\u0928\u094d\u0939\u094b\u0964<\/span> \u0915\u0948\u0915\u0947\u0907\u0939\u0941\u0902<\/span> \u0915\u0940<\/span> \u092e\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u0939\u0930\u093f<\/span> \u0932\u0940\u0928\u094d\u0939\u094b\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092c\u0928\u0939\u0942\u0902<\/span> \u092e\u0947\u0902<\/span> \u092e\u0943\u0917<\/span> \u0915\u092a\u091f<\/span> \u0926\u093f\u0916\u093e\u0908\u0964<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0924\u0941<\/span> \u091c\u093e\u0928\u0915\u0940<\/span> \u0917\u0908<\/span> \u091a\u0924\u0941\u0930\u093e\u0908\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0932\u0916\u0928\u0939\u093f\u0902<\/span> \u0936\u0915\u094d\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u0915\u0932<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u093f\u0921\u093e\u0930\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u092e\u091a\u093f\u0917\u093e<\/span> \u0926\u0932<\/span> \u092e\u0947\u0902<\/span> \u0939\u093e\u0939\u093e\u0915\u093e\u0930\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0930\u093e\u0935\u0923<\/span> \u0915\u0940<\/span> \u0917\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u092e\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u092c\u094c\u0930\u093e\u0908\u0964<\/span> \u0930\u093e\u092e\u091a\u0928\u094d\u0926\u094d\u0930<\/span> \u0938\u094b\u0902<\/span> \u092c\u0948\u0930<\/span> \u092c\u095d\u093e\u0908\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0926\u093f\u092f\u094b<\/span> \u0915\u0940\u091f<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u093f<\/span> \u0915\u0902\u091a\u0928<\/span> \u0932\u0902\u0915\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u092c\u091c\u093f<\/span> \u092c\u091c\u0930\u0902\u0917<\/span> \u092c\u0940\u0930<\/span> \u0915\u0940<\/span> \u0921\u0902\u0915\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0928\u0943\u092a<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u0915\u094d\u0930\u092e<\/span> \u092a\u0930<\/span> \u0924\u0941\u0939\u093f<\/span> \u092a\u0917\u0941<\/span> \u0927\u093e\u0930\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u091a\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0930<\/span> \u092e\u092f\u0942\u0930<\/span> \u0928\u093f\u0917\u0932\u093f<\/span> \u0917\u0948<\/span> \u0939\u093e\u0930\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0939\u093e\u0930<\/span> \u0928\u094c\u0932\u093e\u0916\u093e<\/span> \u0932\u093e\u0917\u094d\u092f\u094b<\/span> \u091a\u094b\u0930\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u0939\u093e\u0925<\/span> \u092a\u0948\u0930<\/span> \u0921\u0930\u0935\u093e\u092f\u094b<\/span> \u0924\u094b\u0930\u0940\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092d\u093e\u0930\u0940<\/span> \u0926\u0936\u093e<\/span> \u0928\u093f\u0915\u0943\u0937\u094d\u091f<\/span> \u0926\u093f\u0916\u093e\u092f\u094b\u0964<\/span> \u0924\u0947\u0932\u093f\u0939\u093f\u0902<\/span> \u0918\u0930<\/span> \u0915\u094b\u0932\u094d\u0939\u0942<\/span> \u091a\u0932\u0935\u093e\u092f\u094b\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0935\u093f\u0928\u092f<\/span> \u0930\u093e\u0917<\/span> \u0926\u0940\u092a\u0915<\/span> \u092e\u0939\u0901<\/span> \u0915\u0940\u0928\u094d\u0939\u094b\u0902\u0964<\/span> \u0924\u092c<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u0938\u0928\u094d\u0928<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u092d\u0941<\/span> \u0939\u0935\u0948<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0916<\/span> \u0926\u0940\u0928\u094d\u0939\u094b\u0902\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0939\u0930\u093f\u0936\u094d\u091a\u0928\u094d\u0926\u094d\u0930<\/span> \u0928\u0943\u092a<\/span> \u0928\u093e\u0930\u093f<\/span> \u092c\u093f\u0915\u093e\u0928\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u0906\u092a\u0939\u0941\u0902<\/span> \u092d\u0930\u0947<\/span> \u0921\u094b\u092e<\/span> \u0918\u0930<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0928\u0940\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0924\u0948\u0938\u0947<\/span> \u0928\u0932<\/span> \u092a\u0930<\/span> \u0926\u0936\u093e<\/span> \u0938\u093f\u0930\u093e\u0928\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u092d\u0942\u0902\u091c\u0940<\/span>-\u092e\u0940\u0928<\/span> \u0915\u0942\u0926<\/span> \u0917\u0908<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0928\u0940\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940<\/span> \u0936\u0902\u0915\u0930\u0939\u093f<\/span> \u0917\u0939\u092f\u094b<\/span> \u091c\u092c<\/span> \u091c\u093e\u0908\u0964<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0930\u094d\u0935\u0924\u0940<\/span> \u0915\u094b<\/span> \u0938\u0924\u0940<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u093e\u0908\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0924\u0928\u093f\u0915<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u0932\u094b\u0915\u0924<\/span> \u0939\u0940<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u093f<\/span> \u0930\u0940\u0938\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u0928\u092d<\/span> \u0909\u095c\u093f<\/span> \u0917\u092f\u094b<\/span> \u0917\u094c\u0930\u093f\u0938\u0941\u0924<\/span> \u0938\u0940\u0938\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092a\u093e\u0923\u094d\u0921\u0935<\/span> \u092a\u0930<\/span> \u092d\u0948<\/span> \u0926\u0936\u093e<\/span> \u0924\u0941\u092e\u094d\u0939\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u092c\u091a\u0940<\/span> \u0926\u094d\u0930\u094b\u092a\u0926\u0940<\/span> \u0939\u094b\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u0909\u0927\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0915\u094c\u0930\u0935<\/span> \u0915\u0947<\/span> \u092d\u0940<\/span> \u0917\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u092e\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0930\u092f\u094b\u0964<\/span> \u092f\u0941\u0926\u094d\u0927<\/span> \u092e\u0939\u093e\u092d\u093e\u0930\u0924<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u093f<\/span> \u0921\u093e\u0930\u092f\u094b\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0930\u0935\u093f<\/span> \u0915\u0939\u0902<\/span> \u092e\u0941\u0916<\/span> \u092e\u0939\u0902<\/span> \u0927\u0930\u093f<\/span> \u0924\u0924\u094d\u0915\u093e\u0932\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u0932\u0947\u0915\u0930<\/span> \u0915\u0942\u0926\u093f<\/span> \u092a\u0930\u092f\u094b<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0924\u093e\u0932\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0936\u0947\u0937<\/span> \u0926\u0947\u0935<\/span>-\u0932\u0916\u093f<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u0928\u0924\u0940<\/span> \u0932\u093e\u0908\u0964<\/span> \u0930\u0935\u093f<\/span> \u0915\u094b<\/span> \u092e\u0941\u0916<\/span> \u0924\u0947<\/span> \u0926\u093f\u092f\u094b<\/span> \u091b\u0941\u095c\u0908\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0935\u093e\u0939\u0928<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u092d\u0941<\/span> \u0915\u0947<\/span> \u0938\u093e\u0924<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u091c\u093e\u0928\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u091c\u0917<\/span> \u0926\u093f\u0917\u094d\u091c<\/span> \u0917\u0930\u094d\u0926\u092d<\/span> \u092e\u0943\u0917<\/span> \u0938\u094d\u0935\u093e\u0928\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u092e\u094d\u092c\u0941\u0915<\/span> \u0938\u093f\u0902\u0939<\/span> \u0906\u0926\u093f<\/span> \u0928\u0916<\/span> \u0927\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u0938\u094b<\/span> \u092b\u0932<\/span> \u091c\u094d\u092f\u094b\u0924\u093f\u0937<\/span> \u0915\u0939\u0924<\/span> \u092a\u0941\u0915\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0917\u091c<\/span> \u0935\u093e\u0939\u0928<\/span> \u0932\u0915\u094d\u0937\u094d\u092e\u0940<\/span> \u0917\u0943\u0939<\/span> \u0906\u0935\u0948\u0902\u0964<\/span> \u0939\u092f<\/span> \u0924\u0947<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0916<\/span> \u0938\u092e\u094d\u092a\u0924\u094d\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u0909\u092a\u091c\u093e\u0935\u0948\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0917\u0930\u094d\u0926\u092d<\/span> \u0939\u093e\u0928\u093f<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0948<\/span> \u092c\u0939\u0941<\/span> \u0915\u093e\u091c\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u0917\u0930\u094d\u0926\u092d<\/span> \u0938\u093f\u0902\u0926\u094d\u0927\u0915\u0930<\/span> \u0930\u093e\u091c<\/span> \u0938\u092e\u093e\u091c\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u092e\u094d\u092c\u0941\u0915<\/span> \u092c\u0941\u0926\u094d\u0927\u093f<\/span> \u0928\u0937\u094d\u091f<\/span> \u0915\u0930<\/span> \u0921\u093e\u0930\u0948\u0964<\/span> \u092e\u0943\u0917<\/span> \u0926\u0947<\/span> \u0915\u0937\u094d\u091f<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0923<\/span> \u0938\u0902\u0939\u093e\u0930\u0948\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u092c<\/span> \u0906\u0935\u0939\u093f\u0902<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u092d\u0941<\/span> \u0938\u094d\u0935\u093e\u0928<\/span> \u0938\u0935\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u091a\u094b\u0930\u0940<\/span> \u0906\u0926\u093f<\/span> \u0939\u094b\u092f<\/span> \u0921\u0930<\/span> \u092d\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0924\u0948\u0938\u0939\u093f<\/span> \u091a\u093e\u0930\u093f<\/span> \u091a\u0930\u0923<\/span> \u092f\u0939<\/span> \u0928\u093e\u092e\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u0938\u094d\u0935\u0930\u094d\u0923<\/span> \u0932\u094c\u0939<\/span> \u091a\u093e\u0901\u091c\u0940<\/span> \u0905\u0930\u0941<\/span> \u0924\u093e\u092e\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0932\u094c\u0939<\/span> \u091a\u0930\u0923<\/span> \u092a\u0930<\/span> \u091c\u092c<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u092d\u0941<\/span> \u0906\u0935\u0948\u0902\u0964<\/span> \u0927\u0928<\/span> \u091c\u0928<\/span> \u0938\u092e\u094d\u092a\u0924\u094d\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u0928\u0937\u094d\u091f<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u093e\u0935\u0948\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0938\u092e\u0924\u093e<\/span> \u0924\u093e\u092e\u094d\u0930<\/span> \u0930\u091c\u0924<\/span> \u0936\u0941\u092d\u0915\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u0938\u094d\u0935\u0930\u094d\u0923<\/span> \u0938\u0930\u094d\u0935\u0938\u0941\u0916<\/span> \u092e\u0902\u0917\u0932<\/span> \u0915\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0915\u0930\u0924<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0920<\/span> \u091a\u093e\u0932\u0940\u0938<\/span> \u0926\u093f\u0928<\/span>, \u0939\u094b<\/span> \u092d\u0935\u0938\u093e\u0917\u0930<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0930\u0965<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"37","post_id":"41","lang_id":"2","post_title":"SAI BABA KI AARTI ","post_desc":"

Aarti Utaare Hum Tumhari Sai Baba<\/p>\n

Charano Ke Tere Hum Pujaari Sai Baba<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Vidya Bal Budhhi, Bandu Mata Pita Ho<\/p>\n

Tan Man Dhan Praan, Tum Hi Sakha Ho<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Hey Jagdata Avtaare Sai Baba<\/p>\n

Aarti Utaare Hum Tumhari Sai Baba<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Bramha Ke Sagun Avtaar Tum Swami<\/p>\n

Gyani Dayavaan Prabhu Antaryaami<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Sun Lo Vinti Hamari Sai Baba<\/p>\n

Aarti Utaare Hum Tumhari Sai Baba<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Aadi Ho Anant Trigunaatmak Murti<\/p>\n

Sindhu Karuna Ke Ho Udharak Murti<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Shirdi Ke Sant Chamatkaari Sai Baba<\/p>\n

Aarti Utaare Hum Tumhari Sai Baba<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

 Bhakto Ki Khaatir, Janam Liye Tum<\/p>\n

Prem Gyan Satya Sneh, Marm Diye Tum<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Dukhiya Jano Ke Hitkaari Sai Baba<\/p>\n

Aarti Utaare Hum Tumhari Sai Baba.<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"38","post_id":"42","lang_id":"2","post_title":"Shani Chalisa","post_desc":"

DOHA :<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Ganesh Girija Suwan, Mangal karan kripaal.<\/span><\/p>\n

Deenan ke Dhuk dhoor kari, Kheejai Naath Nihaal.<\/span><\/p>\n

JaiJai SriShanidev Prabhu, Sunahu Vinay Maharaaj<\/span><\/p>\n

Karahu Kruia hey Ravitanay, Rakhahu Jan ki Laaj.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Jayathi jayathi shani dayaala, karath sadha bhakthan prathipaala.<\/span><\/p>\n

Chaari bhuja, thanu shyam viraajay, maathey ratan mukut chavi chaajay.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Param vishaal manohar bhaala, tedi dhrishti bhrukuti vikraala.<\/span><\/p>\n

Kundal shravan chamaacham chamke, hiye maal mukthan mani dhamkay.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Kar me gadha thrishul kutaara, pal bich karai arihi samhaara.<\/span><\/p>\n

Pinghal, krishno, chaaya, nandhan, yum, konasth, raudra, dhuk bhamjan.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Sauri, mandh shani, dhasha naama, bhanu puthra poojhin sab kaama.<\/span><\/p>\n

Jaapar prabu prasan havain jhaahin, rakhhun raav karai shan maahin.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Parvathhu thrun hoi nihaarath, thrunhu ko parvath kari daarath.<\/span><\/p>\n

Raaj milath ban raamhin dheenhyo, kaikeyihu ki mathi hari linhiyo.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Banhu mae mrag kapat dhikaayi, maathu Janki gayi chooraayi.<\/span><\/p>\n

Lakanhin shakthi vikal kari daara, machiga dhal mae haahaakaar.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Raavan ki ghathi-mathi bauraayi, Ramchandra so bair badaayi.<\/span><\/p>\n

Dheeyo keet kari kanchan Lanka, baji bajarang beer ki danka.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Nrip vikram par thuhin pagu dhaara, chitra mayur nigli gai haara.<\/span><\/p>\n

Haar naulakka laagyo chori, haath pair darvaayo thori.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Bhaari dhasha nikrusht dhikaayo, telhin ghar kholhu chalvaayo.<\/span><\/p>\n

Vinay raag dheepak mah khinho, tab prasann prabhu hvai sukh dheenho.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Harishchandra nrip naari bhikani, aaphun bharen dome gar paani.<\/span><\/p>\n

Tasse nal par dasha sirani, bhunji-meen koodh gayi paani.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Sri Shankarhin gahyo jab jaayi, Paarvathi ko sathi karaayi.<\/span><\/p>\n

Thanik vilokath hi kari reesa, nabh udi gayo gaurisuth seesa.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Paandav par bhay dasha thumhaari, bachi draupadhi hothi udhaari.<\/span><\/p>\n

Kaurav ke bi gathi mathi maaryo, yudh mahabharath kari daryo.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Ravi kah mukh mahn dhari thathkala, lekar koodhi paryo paathaala.<\/span><\/p>\n

Saish dhev-lakhi vinthi laayi, Ravi ko mukh thay dhiyo chudaayi.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Vaahan prabhu kay saah sujana, jag dhigaj gadharbh mragh swaana.<\/span><\/p>\n

Jambuk singh aadhi nakh dhari, so phal jyothish kahath pukari.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Gaj vahan lakshmi gruha aavai, hay thay sukh sampathi upjaavay.<\/span><\/p>\n

Gadharbh haani karai bahu kaaja, singh sidh kar raaj samaja.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Jhambuk budhi nasht kar darai, mrag dhe kasht praan sangharay.<\/span><\/p>\n

Jab aavahi prabu swaan savaari, chori aadi hoy dar bhaari.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Thaishi chaari charan yeh naama, swarn laoh chaandhi aru taama.<\/span><\/p>\n

Lauh charan par jab prabu aavain, daan jan sampathi nashta karavain.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Samatha thaamra rajath shubhkari, swarn sarva sukh mangal bhaari.<\/span><\/p>\n

Jo yeh shani charithra nith gavai, kabahu na dasha nikrushta sathavai.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Adhbuth nath dhikavain leela, karaen shaatru kay nashi bhali dheela.<\/span><\/p>\n

Jo pundith suyogya bulvaayi vidhyvath shani graha shanti karayi.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Peepal jal shani diwas chadavath, deep dhaan dai bahu sukh pawath.<\/span><\/p>\n

Kahath Ram Sundhar prabu dasa, Shani sumirath sukh hoth prakasha.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

DOHA:<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Paath Shanichar Dev ko, ko hoon Vimal Taiyaar.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u091c\u092f<\/span> \u0928\u091f<\/span>-\u0928\u093e\u0917\u0930<\/span> \u0928\u093e\u0917<\/span> \u0928\u0925\u0948\u092f\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u0915\u0943\u0937\u094d\u0923<\/span> \u0915\u0928\u094d\u0939\u0948\u092f\u093e<\/span> \u0927\u0947\u0928\u0941<\/span> \u091a\u0930\u0948\u092f\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092a\u0941\u0928\u093f<\/span> \u0928\u0916<\/span> \u092a\u0930<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u092d\u0941<\/span> \u0917\u093f\u0930\u093f\u0935\u0930<\/span> \u0927\u093e\u0930\u094b\u0964<\/span> \u0906\u0913<\/span> \u0926\u0940\u0928\u0928<\/span> \u0915\u0937\u094d\u091f<\/span> \u0928\u093f\u0935\u093e\u0930\u094b\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0935\u0902\u0936\u0940<\/span> \u092e\u0927\u0941\u0930<\/span> \u0905\u0927\u0930<\/span> \u0927\u0930\u0940<\/span> \u0924\u0947\u0930\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u0939\u094b\u0935\u0947<\/span> \u092a\u0942\u0930\u094d\u0923<\/span> \u092e\u0928\u094b\u0930\u0925<\/span> \u092e\u0947\u0930\u094b\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0906\u0913<\/span> \u0939\u0930\u093f<\/span> \u092a\u0941\u0928\u093f<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0916\u0928<\/span> \u091a\u093e\u0916\u094b\u0964<\/span> \u0906\u091c<\/span> \u0932\u093e\u091c<\/span> \u092d\u093e\u0930\u0924<\/span> \u0915\u0940<\/span> \u0930\u093e\u0916\u094b\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092a\u094d\u0930\u0947\u092e<\/span> \u0915\u0947<\/span> \u0938\u093e\u0917<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u0926\u0941\u0930<\/span> \u0918\u0930<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0902\u0917\u0947\u0964<\/span> \u0926\u0941\u0930\u094d\u092f\u094b\u0927\u0928<\/span> \u0915\u0947<\/span> \u092e\u0947\u0935\u093e<\/span> \u0924\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0917\u0947\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0932\u0916\u093f<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u0947\u092e<\/span> \u0915\u0940<\/span> \u092e\u0939\u093f\u092e\u093e<\/span> \u092d\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u0910\u0938\u0947<\/span> \u0936\u094d\u092f\u093e\u092e<\/span> \u0926\u0940\u0928<\/span> \u0939\u093f\u0924\u0915\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092d\u093e\u0930\u0924<\/span> \u0915\u0947<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0930\u0925<\/span> \u0930\u0925<\/span> \u0939\u093e\u0902\u0915\u0947\u0964<\/span> \u0932\u093f\u090f<\/span> \u091a\u0915\u094d\u0930<\/span> \u0915\u0930<\/span> \u0928\u0939\u093f\u0902<\/span> \u092c\u0932<\/span> \u0924\u093e\u0915\u0947\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0928\u093f\u091c<\/span> \u0917\u0940\u0924\u093e<\/span> \u0915\u0947<\/span> \u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0928<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0928\u093e\u092f\u0947\u0964<\/span> \u092d\u0915\u094d\u0924\u0928<\/span> \u0939\u094d\u0930\u0926\u092f<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0927\u093e<\/span> \u0935\u0930\u094d\u0937\u093e\u092f\u0947\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092e\u0940\u0930\u093e<\/span> \u0925\u0940<\/span> \u0910\u0938\u0940<\/span> \u092e\u0924\u0935\u093e\u0932\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u0937<\/span> \u092a\u0940<\/span> \u0917\u0908<\/span> \u092c\u091c\u093e\u0915\u0930<\/span> \u0924\u093e\u0932\u0940\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0930\u093e\u0928\u093e<\/span> \u092d\u0947\u091c\u093e<\/span> \u0938\u093e\u0902\u092a<\/span> \u092a\u093f\u091f\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u0936\u093e\u0932\u093f\u0917\u094d\u0930\u093e\u092e<\/span> \u092c\u0928\u0947<\/span> \u092c\u0928\u0935\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0928\u093f\u091c<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u092f\u093e<\/span> \u0924\u0941\u092e<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u0927\u093f\u0939\u093f\u0902<\/span> \u0926\u093f\u0916\u093e\u092f\u094b\u0964<\/span> \u0909\u0930<\/span> \u0924\u0947<\/span> \u0938\u0902\u0936\u092f<\/span> \u0938\u0915\u0932<\/span> \u092e\u093f\u091f\u093e\u092f\u094b\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0924\u092c<\/span> \u0936\u0924<\/span> \u0928\u093f\u0928\u094d\u0926\u093e<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0940<\/span> \u0924\u0924\u094d\u0915\u093e\u0932\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u091c\u0940\u0935\u0928<\/span> \u092e\u0941\u0915\u094d\u0924<\/span> \u092d\u092f\u094b<\/span> \u0936\u093f\u0936\u0941\u092a\u093e\u0932\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u092c\u0939\u093f\u0902<\/span> \u0926\u094d\u0930\u094c\u092a\u0926\u0940<\/span> \u091f\u0947\u0930<\/span> \u0932\u0917\u093e\u0908\u0964<\/span> \u0926\u0940\u0928\u093e\u0928\u093e\u0925<\/span> \u0932\u093e\u091c<\/span> \u0905\u092c<\/span> \u091c\u093e\u0908\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0924\u0941\u0930\u0924\u0939\u093f\u0902<\/span> \u0935\u0938\u0928<\/span> \u092c\u0928\u0947<\/span> \u0928\u0928\u0928\u094d\u0926\u0932\u093e\u0932\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u092c\u095d\u0947<\/span> \u091a\u0940\u0930<\/span> \u092d\u0948<\/span> \u0905\u0930\u093f<\/span> \u092e\u0941\u0901\u0939<\/span> \u0915\u093e\u0932\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0905\u0938<\/span> \u0928\u093e\u0925<\/span> \u0915\u0947<\/span> \u0928\u093e\u0925<\/span> \u0915\u0928\u094d\u0939\u0948\u092f\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u0921\u0942\u092c\u0924<\/span> \u092d\u0902\u0935\u0930<\/span> \u092c\u091a\u093e\u0935\u0924<\/span> \u0928\u0948\u092f\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0938\u0941\u0928\u094d\u0926\u0930\u0926\u093e\u0938<\/span> \u0906\u0938<\/span> \u0909\u0930<\/span> \u0927\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u0926\u092f\u093e\u0926\u0943\u0937\u094d\u091f\u093f<\/span> \u0915\u0940\u091c\u0948<\/span> \u092c\u0928\u0935\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0928\u093e\u0925<\/span> \u0938\u0915\u0932<\/span> \u092e\u092e<\/span> \u0915\u0941\u092e\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u0928\u093f\u0935\u093e\u0930\u094b\u0964<\/span> \u0915\u094d\u0937\u092e\u0939\u0941<\/span> \u092c\u0947\u0917\u093f<\/span> \u0905\u092a\u0930\u093e\u0927<\/span> \u0939\u092e\u093e\u0930\u094b\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0916\u094b\u0932\u094b<\/span> \u092a\u091f<\/span> \u0905\u092c<\/span> \u0926\u0930\u094d\u0936\u0928<\/span> \u0926\u0940\u091c\u0948\u0964<\/span> \u092c\u094b\u0932\u094b<\/span> \u0915\u0943\u0937\u094d\u0923<\/span> \u0915\u0928\u094d\u0939\u0948\u092f\u093e<\/span> \u0915\u0940<\/span> \u091c\u0948\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0965\u0926\u094b\u0939\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092f\u0939<\/span> \u091a\u093e\u0932\u0940\u0938\u093e<\/span> \u0915\u0943\u0937\u094d\u0923<\/span> \u0915\u093e<\/span>, \u092a\u093e\u0920<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0948<\/span> \u0909\u0930<\/span> \u0927\u093e\u0930\u093f\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

'\u0938\u093e\u0908\u0902\u0926\u093e\u0938<\/span>' \u0906\u0930\u0924\u0940<\/span> \u0915\u094b<\/span> \u0917\u093e\u0935\u0947<\/span> | 
\u0918\u0930<\/span> \u092e\u0947\u0902<\/span> \u092c\u0938\u093f<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0916<\/span>, \u092e\u0902\u0917\u0932<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0935\u0947<\/span> || <\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"42","post_id":"46","lang_id":"2","post_title":"Krishan Chalisa","post_desc":"

Shri Krishan Chalisa<\/span><\/strong><\/p>\n

Doha :<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span>Banshi shobhit kar madhur, nil jalaj tanu shyam.<\/span><\/p>\n

Arun adhar janu bimba phal, nayan kamal abhiram.<\/span><\/p>\n

Puran Indu Arvind mukh, pitambar suchi saj.<\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Man Mohan Madan chhavi,Krishiaachandra maharaj.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Jai jai Yadunandan jag vandan. Jai Vasudev Devki nandan.<\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Yashoda sut Nandadulare. Jai prabhu bhaktan ke rakhvare.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Natanagar Nag nathaiya. Krishna Kanhaiya dhenu charaiya.<\/span><\/p>\n

Puni nakh par Prabhu Girivar dharo. Ao dinan-kasht nivaro.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Banshi madhur adhar-dhari tero. Hove puran manorath mero.<\/span><\/p>\n

Ao Harli puni makhan chakho. Aaj laj bhaktan ki rakho.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Gol kapol chibuk arunare. Mridu muskan mohini dare.<\/span><\/p>\n

Rajit Rajiv nayan vishala. Mor mukut vaijantimala.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Kundal shravan pit pat achhe. Kati kinkini kachhani kachhe.<\/span><\/p>\n

Nil jalaj sundar tan sohai. Chhavi lakhi sur nar muni man mohai.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Mastak tilak alak ghunghrale. Ao Shyam bansuriya vale.<\/span><\/p>\n

Kari pai pan putanahin taryo. Aka-baka kagasur maryo.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Madhuvan jalat agin jab jvala. Bhe shital lakhatahin Nandaiala.<\/span><\/p>\n

Jab surpati Brij chadhyo risai. Musar dhar bari barsai.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Lakhat lakhat Bnij chahat bahayo. Govardhan nakh dhari bachayo.<\/span><\/p>\n

Lakhi Yashuda man bhram adhikai. Mukh mahan chaudah bhuvan dikhai.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Dusht Kansa ati udham machayo. Koti kamal kahan phul mangayo.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span>Nathi kaiiyahin ko tum linhyo. Charan chinh dai nirbhai kinhyo.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span>Kari gopin sang ras bilasa. Sab ki pur kari abhilasa.<\/span><\/p>\n

Aganit maha asur sanharyo. Kansahi kesh pakadi dai maryo.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Matu pita ki bandi chhudayo. Ugrasen kahan raj dilayo.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Him se mritak chhahon sut layo. Matu Devakl shok mitayo.<\/span><\/p>\n

Narkasur mur khal sanhari. Lae shatdash sahas kumari.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Dai Bhimahin tran chiri isara. Jarasindh rakshas kahan mara.<\/span><\/p>\n

Asur vrikasur adik maryau. Nij bhaktan kar kasht nivaryau.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Din Sudama ke dukh taryo. Tandul tin muthi mukh daryo.<\/span><\/p>\n

Duryodhan ke tyagyo meva. Kiyo Vidur ghar shak kaleva.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Lakhi prem tuhin mahima bhari. Naumi Shyam danan hitkari.<\/span><\/p>\n

Bharat men parath-rath hanke. Liye chakra kar nahin bat thake.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Nij Gita ke gyan sunaye. Bhaktan hridai sudha sarsaye. <\/span><\/p>\n

Mira aisi matvali. vish pi gayi bajakar tali.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Rana bheja saap pitari. Shaligram bane banvari.<\/span><\/p>\n

Nij maya tum vidhihin dikhayo. Urte sanshai sakal mitayo.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Tav shatninda kari tatkala, jivan mukt bhayo shishupala.<\/span><\/p>\n

Jabahin Draupadi ter lagai. Dinanath laj ab jai. <\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Turatahih basan bane Nandlala. Badhay chir bhe ari munh kala.<\/span><\/p>\n

As anath ke nath Kanhaiya. Dubat bhanvar bachavahi naiya.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

 \"Sundardas\" Aas ur Dharri. Daya Drishti Keejay Banwari.<\/span><\/p>\n

Nath sakai un kumati nivaro. chhamon vegi apradh hamaro.<\/span><\/p>\n

Kholo pat ab darshan dijai. Bolo Krishna Kanhaiya ki jai.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Doha :<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Yeh chalisa Krishna ka, path krai ur dhari,<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

asht siddhi nay niddhi phal, lahai padarath chari.<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"43","post_id":"47","lang_id":"2","post_title":"SAI BABA KI AARTI","post_desc":"

Aarti Shree Sai guruvar ki,Parmanand sada survar ki.<\/p>\n

Jaki kripa vipul sukhkari,Dukh, shok, sankat,bhaykari<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Shirdi mein avtar rachaya, Chamatkar se tatva dikhaya<\/p>\n

kitne bhakt charan par aaye, veh sukh-shanti chirtan paye<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Bhav dhare mann mein jaisa, pavat anubhav woh hi waisa<\/p>\n

Guru ki udi lagave tan ko,Samadhan lahbhat uss mannko<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Sai naam sada jo gave, So phal jag mein shshvat pave<\/p>\n

Guruvarsar kari pooja-seva, uss par kripa karat gurudeva<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Ram, krishna, Hanuman roop mein, De darshan jaanat jo mann mein<\/p>\n

Vividh dharm ke sevak aate, Darshan se eechit phal pate<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jai bolo Saibaba ki, Jai bolo Avdhotguru ki<\/p>\n

Sai Ki Aarti Jo Koi Gave, GGhar mein basi sukh, mangal pave .<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Anant Koti, Brhamand Nayak<\/p>\n

Raja Dhir Raj, Yogi Raj.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jai Jai Jai Sai Baba Ki, Aarti Shri Sai Guruvar Ki<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Om Shiridi Vasaye Vidmahe Sachidanandaye<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Dhimahi Tano Sai Prachodyaat.<\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"44","post_id":"48","lang_id":"1","post_title":"\u0930\u093e\u092e \u091a\u093e\u0932\u0940\u0938\u093e","post_desc":"

\u0917\u0923\u092a\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u0928\u093e\u092e<\/span> \u0924\u0941\u092e\u094d\u0939\u093e\u0930\u094b<\/span> \u0932\u0940\u0928\u094d\u0939\u094b\u0964<\/span> \u0924\u093f\u0928\u0915\u094b<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u0925\u092e<\/span> \u092a\u0942\u091c\u094d\u092f<\/span> \u0924\u0941\u092e<\/span> \u0915\u0940\u0928\u094d\u0939\u094b\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0936\u0947\u0937<\/span> \u0930\u091f\u0924<\/span> \u0928\u093f\u0924<\/span> \u0928\u093e\u092e<\/span> \u0924\u0941\u092e\u094d\u0939\u093e\u0930\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u092e\u0939\u093f<\/span> \u0915\u094b<\/span> \u092d\u093e\u0930<\/span> \u0936\u0940\u0936<\/span> \u092a\u0930<\/span> \u0927\u093e\u0930\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092f\u093e\u0915\u094b<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0920<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0947<\/span> \u091c\u094b<\/span> \u0915\u094b\u0908\u0964<\/span> \u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0928<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u0915\u091f<\/span> \u0924\u093e\u0915\u0947<\/span> \u0909\u0930<\/span> \u0939\u094b\u0908\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0906\u0935\u093e\u0917\u092e\u0928<\/span> \u092e\u093f\u091f\u0948<\/span> \u0924\u093f\u0939\u093f<\/span> \u0915\u0947\u0930\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u0938\u0924\u094d\u092f<\/span> \u0935\u091a\u0928<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0928\u0947<\/span> \u0936\u093f\u0935<\/span> \u092e\u0947\u0930\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0914\u0930<\/span> \u0906\u0938<\/span> \u092e\u0928<\/span> \u092e\u0947\u0902<\/span> \u091c\u094b<\/span> \u0939\u094b\u0908\u0964<\/span> \u092e\u0928\u0935\u093e\u0902\u091b\u093f\u0924<\/span> \u092b\u0932<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0935\u0947<\/span> \u0938\u094b\u0908\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0924\u0940\u0928\u0939\u0941\u0902<\/span> \u0915\u093e\u0932<\/span> \u0927\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0928<\/span> \u091c\u094b<\/span> \u0932\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0935\u0948\u0964<\/span> \u0924\u0941\u0932\u0938\u0940<\/span> \u0926\u0932<\/span> \u0905\u0930\u0941<\/span> \u092b\u0942\u0932<\/span> \u091a\u0922\u093c\u093e\u0935\u0948\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0938\u093e\u0917<\/span> \u092a\u0924\u094d\u0930<\/span> \u0938\u094b<\/span> \u092d\u094b\u0917<\/span> \u0932\u0917\u093e\u0935\u0948\u0964<\/span> \u0938\u094b<\/span> \u0928\u0930<\/span> \u0938\u0915\u0932<\/span> \u0938\u093f\u0926\u094d\u0927\u0924\u093e<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0935\u0948\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0905\u0928\u094d\u0924<\/span> \u0938\u092e\u092f<\/span> \u0930\u0918\u0941\u092c\u0930<\/span> \u092a\u0941\u0930<\/span> \u091c\u093e\u0908\u0964<\/span> \u091c\u0939\u093e\u0902<\/span> \u091c\u0928\u094d\u092e<\/span> \u0939\u0930\u093f<\/span> \u092d\u0915\u094d\u0924<\/span> \u0915\u0939\u093e\u0908\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940<\/span> \u0939\u0930\u093f\u0926\u093e\u0938<\/span> \u0915\u0939\u0948<\/span> \u0905\u0930\u0941<\/span> \u0917\u093e\u0935\u0948\u0964<\/span> \u0938\u094b<\/span> \u092c\u0948\u0915\u0941\u0923\u094d\u0920<\/span> \u0927\u093e\u092e<\/span> \u0915\u094b<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0935\u0948\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0965\u0926\u094b\u0939\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0938\u093e\u0924<\/span> \u0926\u093f\u0935\u0938<\/span> \u091c\u094b<\/span> \u0928\u0947\u092e<\/span> \u0915\u0930<\/span>, \u092a\u093e\u0920<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0947<\/span> \u091a\u093f\u0924<\/span> \u0932\u093e\u092f\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0939\u0930\u093f\u0926\u093e\u0938<\/span> \u0939\u0930\u093f<\/span> \u0915\u0943\u092a\u093e<\/span> \u0938\u0947<\/span>, \u0905\u0935\u0938\u093f<\/span> \u092d\u0915\u094d\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u0915\u094b<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u092f\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0930\u093e\u092e<\/span> \u091a\u093e\u0932\u0940\u0938\u093e<\/span> \u091c\u094b<\/span> \u092a\u0922\u093c\u0947<\/span>, \u0930\u093e\u092e<\/span> \u091a\u0930\u0923<\/span> \u091a\u093f\u0924<\/span> \u0932\u093e\u092f\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u091c\u094b<\/span> \u0907\u091a\u094d\u091b\u093e<\/span> \u092e\u0928<\/span> \u092e\u0947\u0902<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0948<\/span>, \u0938\u0915\u0932<\/span> \u0938\u093f\u0926\u094d\u0927<\/span> \u0939\u094b<\/span> \u091c\u093e\u092f\u0965<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"45","post_id":"49","lang_id":"1","post_title":"\u0938\u0930\u0938\u094d\u0935\u0924\u0940 \u092e\u093e \u0915\u0940 \u0906\u0930\u0924\u0940","post_desc":"

\u091a\u0928\u094d\u0926\u094d\u0930\u0935\u0926\u0940\u0928 \u092a\u0926\u0942\u092e\u093e\u0938\u093f\u0928\u093f, \u0926\u094d\u092f\u0941\u0924\u093f \u092e\u0902\u0917\u0932\u0915\u093e\u0930\u0940 |

\u0935\u093f\u0927\u093e \u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0928 \u092a\u094d\u0930\u0926\u093e\u092f\u093f\u0928\u0940, \u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0928 \u092a\u094d\u0930\u0915\u093e\u0936 \u092d\u0930\u094b |

\u0927\u0942\u092a \u0926\u0940\u092a \u092b\u0932 \u092e\u0947\u0935\u093e, \u092e\u093e\u0901 \u0938\u094d\u0935\u0940\u0915\u093e\u0930 \u0915\u0930\u094b |
