\u092e\u093e\u0901 \u0938\u0930\u0938\u094d\u0935\u0924\u0940 \u0915\u0940 \u0906\u0930\u0924\u0940, \u091c\u094b \u0915\u094b\u0908 \u091c\u0928 \u0917\u093e\u0935\u0947 |
\u0939\u093f\u0924\u0915\u093e\u0930\u0940 \u0938\u0941\u0916\u0915\u093e\u0930\u0940, \u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0928 \u092d\u0915\u094d\u0924\u093f \u092a\u093e\u0935\u0947 || \u092e\u0948\u092f\u093e \u091c\u092f<\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"46","post_id":"50","lang_id":"2","post_title":"AARTI SARASWATI MATA","post_desc":"

Jai Saraswati mata, Maiya jai Saraswati mata<\/p>\n

Sadgun vaibhav shalini, tribhuvan vikhyata || Jai..<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Chandravadani padmasini dyuti mangalakare,<\/p>\n

Sohe shub hansa savare, atul tejdhari || Jai..<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Baen kar men vina, daen kar mala,<\/p>\n

Shish mukut mani sohe, gal motiyan mala || Jai..<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Devi sharan jo ae, unka uddhar kiya,<\/p>\n

Paithi Manthra dasi, Ravan sanhar kiya || Jai..<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Vidya gyan pradayini, jag men gyan prakash bharo,<\/p>\n

Moh aur agyan timir ka jag se nash karo || Jai..<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Dhup dip phal meva, man svikar karo,<\/p>\n

Gyanchakshu de mata, jag nistar karo || Jai..<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Man Saraswati ki arti jo koi jan gave,<\/p>\n

Hitkari sukhkari, gyan bhakti pave ||Jai..<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"47","post_id":"51","lang_id":"2","post_title":"Ram Chalisa","post_desc":"

DOHA:<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jaani Gauri aanakool, seeye heeye harshi nadu kahi.<\/p>\n

Manjul mangal mool, baag ang pharkan lag.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Shri Raghubir bhagat hitkari, suni lije prabhu araj hamari,<\/p>\n

Nisidin dhyan dhare jo koi, ta sam bhakt aur nahi hoi,<\/p>\n

Dhyan dhare shivji man mahi, brahma indra par nahi pahi,<\/p>\n

Jai jai jai raghunath kripala, sada karo santan pratipala.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Doot tumhar veer hanumana, jasu prabhav tihu pur jana,<\/p>\n

Tuv bhujdand prachand kripala, ravan mari suarn pratipala,<\/p>\n

Tum anath ke nath gosai, deenan ke ho sada sahai,<\/p>\n

Bramhadik tav par na paven, sada eesh tumharo yash gave.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Chariu ved bharat hai sakhi, tum bhaktan ki lajja rakhi,<\/p>\n

Gun gavat sharad man mahi, surpati tako par na pahi,<\/p>\n

Nam tumhare let jo koi, ta sam dhanya aur nahi hoi,<\/p>\n

Ram naam hai aparampara, charin ved jahi pukara.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Ganpati naam tumharo linho, tinko pratham pujya tum kinho,<\/p>\n

Shesh ratat nit naam tumhara, mahi ko bhar shish par dhara,<\/p>\n

Phool saman rahat so bhara, pavat kou na tumharo para,<\/p>\n

Bharat naam tumharo ur dharo, taso kabahu na ran mein haro.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Naam shatrugna hridaya prakasha, sumirat hot shatru kar nasha,<\/p>\n

Lakhan tumhare agyakari, sada karat santan rakhwari,<\/p>\n

Tate ran jeete nahi koi, yuddh jure yamahu kin hoi,<\/p>\n

Mahalakshmi dhar avtara, sab vidhi karat paap ko chhara.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Seeta ram puneeta gayo, bhuvaneshwari prabhav dikhayo,<\/p>\n

Ghat sp prakat bhai so aai, jako dehkat chand lajai,<\/p>\n

So tumhare nit paon palotat, navo nidhi charanan mein lotat,<\/p>\n

Siddhi atharah mangalkari, so tum par jave balihari.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Aurahu jo anek prabhutai, so seetapati tumahi banai,<\/p>\n

Ichchha te kotin sansara, rachat na lagat pal ki bhara,<\/p>\n

Jo tumhare charanan chit lave, taki mukti avasi ho jave,<\/p>\n

Sunahu ram tum tat hamare, tumahi bharat kul poojya prachare.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Tumahi dev kul dev hamare, tum gurudev pran ke pyare,<\/p>\n

Jo kuch ho so tumhahi raja, jai jai jai prabhu rakho laja,<\/p>\n

Ram atma poshan hare, jai jai jai dasrath ke pyare,<\/p>\n

Jai jai jai prabhu jyoti swarupa, nirgun brahma akhand anoopa.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Satya satya jai satyavrat swami, satya sanatan antaryami,<\/p>\n

Satya bhajan tumharo jo gave, So nischay charon phal pave,<\/p>\n

Satya sapath gauripati kinhi, tumne bhaktahi sab siddhi dinhi,<\/p>\n

Gyan hridaya do gyanswarupa, namo namo jai jagpati bhoopa.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Dhanya dhanya tum dhanya pratapa, naam tumhar harat sntapa,<\/p>\n

Satya shudh deva mukh gaya, baji dundubhi shankh bajaya,<\/p>\n

Satya satya tum satya sanatan, tumahi ho hamare tan man dhan,<\/p>\n

Yako path kare jo koi, gyan prakat take ur hoi.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Avagaman mitai tihi kera, satya vachan mane shiv mera,<\/p>\n

Aur aas man mein jo hoi, manvanchit phal pave soi,<\/p>\n

Teenahu kal dhyan jo lave, tulsidas anu phool chadhave,<\/p>\n

Saag patra so bhog lagave, so nar sakal siddhata pave.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Aant samay raghubarpur jai, jaha janma haribhakta kai,<\/p>\n

Shri haridas kahai aru gave, so vaikunth dham ko pave.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

DOHA:<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Saat divas jo nem kar, path kare chit laye,<\/p>\n

Haridas harikripa se, avasi bhakti ko pave.<\/p>\n

Ram chalisa jo padhe, ram sharan chit laye,<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jo ichchha man mein kare, sakal siddh ho jaye.<\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"48","post_id":"52","lang_id":"2","post_title":"Shree Ganesha Aarti","post_desc":"

JAI GANESH JAI GANESH JAI GANESH DEVA
MATA JAKII PARVATII, PITAA MAHAADEVA

EKA DANTA DAYAVANTA, CHAR BHUJA DHAARII
MATHE SINDUURA SOHAI, MUUSE KII SAVARI
JAI GANESH...

ANDHANA KO AANKHA DETA KORHINA KO KAAYAA
BANJHANA KO PUTRA DETA NIRDHANA KO MAAYA
JAI GANESH...

HAAR CHARHE, PHOOL CHARHE AURA CHARHE MEVA
LADDUAN KO BHOGA LAGE SANT KAREN SEVA
JAI GANESHA...

DINAN KI LAAJ RAKHO SHAMBHU PUTRA VAARI
MANORATH KO PURA KARO JAI BALIHAARI
JAI GANESHA...<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"49","post_id":"53","lang_id":"2","post_title":"Surya Deva Chalisa","post_desc":"

\u0965<\/span>Doha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Kanaka Badana Kundala Makara, Mukta Mala Anga\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Padmasana Sthita Dhyaie, Shankha Chakra Ke Sanga\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u0965<\/span>Chaupai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Savita Jai Jayati Divakara!\u0964<\/span> Sahasranshu! Saptashva Timirahara\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Bhanu! Patanga! Marichi! Bhaskara!\u0964<\/span> Savita Hansa! Sunura Vibhakara\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Vivaswana! Aditya! Vikartana\u0964<\/span> Martanda Harirupa Virochana\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Ambaramani! Khaga! Ravi Kahalate\u0964<\/span> Veda Hiranyagarbha Kaha Gate\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Sahasranshu Pradyotana, Kahikahi\u0964<\/span> Munigana Hota Prasanna Modalahi\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Aruna Sadrisha Sarathi Manohara\u0964<\/span> Hankata Haya Sata Chadi Ratha Para\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Mandala Ki Mahima Ati Nyari\u0964<\/span> Teja Rupa Keri Balihari\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Uchchaihshrava Sadrisha Haya Jote\u0964<\/span> Dekhi Purandara Lajjita Hote\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Mitra Marichi Bhanu Aruna Bhaskara\u0964<\/span> Savita Surya Arka Khaga Kalikara\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Pusha Ravi Aditya Nama Lai\u0964<\/span> Hiranyagarbhaya Namah Kahikai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Dwadasa Nama Prema So Gavain\u0964<\/span> Mastaka Baraha Bara Navavain\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Chara Padaratha Jana So Pavai\u0964<\/span> Dukha Daridra Agha Punja Nasavai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Namaskara Ko Chamatkara Yaha\u0964<\/span> Vidhi Harihara Ko Kripasara Yaha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Sevai Bhanu Tumahin Mana Lai\u0964<\/span> Ashtasiddhi Navanidhi Tehin Pai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Baraha Nama Uchcharana Karate\u0964<\/span> Sahasa Janama Ke Pataka Tarate\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Upakhyana Jo Karate Tavajana\u0964<\/span> Ripu So Jamalahate Sotehi Chhana\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Dhana Suta Juta Parivara Badhatu Hai\u0964<\/span> Prabala Moha Ko Phanda Katatu Hai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Arka Shisha Ko Raksha Karate\u0964<\/span> Ravi Lalata Para Nitya Biharate\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Surya Netra Para Nitya Virajata\u0964<\/span> Karna Desa Para Dinakara Chhajata\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Bhanu Nasika Vasakarahunita\u0964<\/span> Bhaskara Karata Sada Mukhako Hita\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Ontha Rahai Parjanya Hamare\u0964<\/span> Rasana Bicha Tikshna Basa Pyare\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Kantha Suvarna Reta Ki Shobha\u0964<\/span> Tigma Tejasah Kandhe Lobha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Pusham Bahu Mitra Pithahin Para\u0964<\/span> Tvashta Varuna Rahata Su-Ushnakara\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Yugala Hatha Para Raksha Karana\u0964<\/span> Bhanumana Urasarma Su-Udarachana\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Basata Nabhi Aditya Manohara\u0964<\/span> Katimanha, Rahata Mana Mudabhara\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jangha Gopati Savita Basa\u0964<\/span> Gupta Divakara Karata Hulasa\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Vivaswana Pada Ki Rakhavari\u0964<\/span> Bahara Basate Nita Tam Hari\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Sahasranshu Sarvanga Samharai\u0964<\/span> Raksha Kavacha Vichitra Vichare\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Asa Jojana Apane Mana Mahi\u0964<\/span> Bhaya Jagabicha Karahun Tehi Nahi\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Dadru Kushtha Tehi Kabahu Na Vyapai\u0964<\/span> Jojana Yako Mana Manha Japai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Andhakara Jaga Ka Jo Harata\u0964<\/span> Nava Prakasha Se Ananda Bharata\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Graha Gana Grasi Na Mitavata Jahi\u0964<\/span> Koti Bara Main Pranavaun Tahi\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Manda Sadrisha Suta Jaga Me Jake\u0964<\/span> Dharmaraja Sam Adbhuta Banke\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Dhanya-Dhanya Tuma Dinamani Deva\u0964<\/span> Kiya Karata Suramuni Nara Seva\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Bhakti Bhavayuta Purna Niyam So\u0964<\/span> Dura Hatataso Bhavake Bhrama So\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Parama Dhanya So Nara Tanadhari\u0964<\/span> Hain Prasanna Jehi Para Tama Hari\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Aruna Magha Mahan Surya Phalguna\u0964<\/span> Madhu Vedanga Nama Ravi Udayana\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Bhanu Udaya Baisakha Ginavai\u0964<\/span> Jyeshtha Indra Ashadha Ravi Gavai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Yama Bhado Ashwin Himareta\u0964<\/span> Katika Hota Divakara Neta\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Agahana Bhinna Vishnu Hain Pusahin\u0964<\/span> Purusha Nama Ravi Hain Malamasahin\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0965<\/span>Doha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Bhanu Chalisa Prema Yuta, Gavahin Je Nar Nitya\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092a\u094d\u0930\u0947\u092e<\/span> \u092d\u0915\u094d\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u0938\u0947<\/span> \u091c\u094b<\/span> \u092f\u0936<\/span> \u0917\u093e\u0935\u0948\u0964<\/span> \u0926\u0941\u0903\u0916<\/span> \u0926\u093e\u0930\u093f\u0926\u094d\u0930<\/span> \u0928\u093f\u0915\u091f<\/span> \u0928\u0939\u093f\u0902<\/span> \u0906\u0935\u0947\u0902\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u094b\u0917\u0940<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0930<\/span> \u092e\u0941\u0928\u093f<\/span> \u0915\u0939\u0924<\/span> \u092a\u0941\u0915\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u092f\u094b\u0917<\/span> \u0928<\/span> \u0939\u094b<\/span> \u092c\u093f\u0928<\/span> \u0936\u0915\u094d\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u0924\u0941\u092e\u094d\u0939\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0936\u0902\u0915\u0930<\/span> \u0906\u091a\u093e\u0930\u091c<\/span> \u0924\u092a<\/span> \u0915\u0940\u0928\u094b\u0964<\/span> \u0915\u093e\u092e<\/span> \u0905\u0930\u0941<\/span> \u0915\u094d\u0930\u094b\u0927<\/span> \u091c\u0940\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u0938\u092c<\/span> \u0932\u0940\u0928\u094b\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0926\u0947\u0935\u0940\u0926\u093e\u0938<\/span> \u0936\u0930\u0923<\/span> \u0928\u093f\u091c<\/span> \u091c\u093e\u0928\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0939\u0941<\/span> \u0915\u0943\u092a\u093e<\/span> \u091c\u0917\u0926\u092e\u094d\u092c<\/span> \u092d\u0935\u093e\u0928\u0940\u0965<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"53","post_id":"57","lang_id":"2","post_title":"Shree Hanuman Aarti","post_desc":"

Aarti Ke Jai Hanuman Lalaki<\/p>\n

Dusht dalan Raghunath kalaki<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jaakay bal say giriwar kaapay, Roog doosh jakay nikat na jhankay<\/p>\n

 Anjani putra maha balli daayee, Santan kay prabhu sada sahaye...<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Day beeraa Raghunath pataway, Lanka jaaree seeya soodi laayee<\/p>\n

Lanka so koti Samundra Seekhaayee, Jaat pawansut baran layee<\/p>\n

 Lanka Jaari Asur Sanghaaray, Seeya Ramjee kay kaaj sawaray...<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Lakshman moor chet paray Sakaaray, Aani Sajeewan praan ubaaray<\/p>\n

Paitee pataal toori jam kaaray, Ahi Ravana kee bujaa ukhaaray<\/p>\n

Baayay bujaa asur dhal maaray, Dahinay bujaa sant jam taray...<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Sur nar Muni aarati utaaray, Jai jai jai Hanuman ucharaay<\/p>\n

 Kanchan thaar Kapoor loo chaayee, Aarati karat Anjani maayee<\/p>\n

Jo Hanuman kee Aarati gaaway, Basee Baikoontha param pad paaway...<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"54","post_id":"58","lang_id":"1","post_title":"\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940 \u0939\u0928\u0941\u092e\u093e\u0928 \u091c\u0940 \u0915\u0940 \u0906\u0930\u0924\u0940","post_desc":"

\u0915\u091a\u0902\u0928<\/span> \u0925\u093e\u0932<\/span> \u0915\u092a\u0942\u0930<\/span> \u0932\u094c<\/span> \u091b\u093e\u0908<\/span> | \u0906\u0930\u0924\u0940<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0924<\/span> \u0905\u0902\u091c\u0928\u0940<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0908<\/span> \u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u094b<\/span> \u0939\u0928\u0941\u092e\u093e\u0928<\/span> \u091c\u0940<\/span> \u0915\u0940<\/span> \u0906\u0930\u0924\u0940<\/span> \u0917\u093e\u092f\u0947<\/span> | \u092c\u0938\u0939\u093f\u0902<\/span> \u092c\u0948\u0915\u0941\u0902\u0920<\/span> \u092a\u0930\u092e<\/span> \u092a\u0926<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u092f\u0948<\/span> \u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u0932\u0902\u0915\u093e<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u0927\u094d\u0935\u0902\u0936<\/span> \u0915\u093f\u092f\u0947<\/span> \u0930\u0918\u0941\u0930\u093e\u0908<\/span> | \u0924\u0941\u0932\u0938\u0940\u0926\u093e\u0938<\/span> \u0938\u094d\u0935\u093e\u092e\u0940<\/span> \u0915\u093f\u0930\u094d\u0924\u0940<\/span> \u0917\u093e\u0908<\/span> \u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u0906\u0930\u0924\u0940<\/span> \u0915\u093f\u091c\u0947<\/span> \u0939\u0928\u0941\u092e\u093e\u0928<\/span> \u0932\u0932\u093e<\/span> \u0915\u0940<\/span> | \u0926\u0941\u0937\u094d\u091f<\/span> \u0926\u0932\u0928<\/span> \u0930\u0918\u0941\u0928\u093e\u0925<\/span> \u0915\u0932\u093e<\/span> \u0915\u0940<\/span> \u0965<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"55","post_id":"59","lang_id":"2","post_title":"Durga Chalisa","post_desc":"

Namo Namo Durge Sukh karani, Namo Namo ambe Dukh harani.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Nirakar hai jyoti tumhari, Tihun lok pheli ujayari.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Shashi lalat mukh mahavishala, Netra lal bhrikutee vikarala.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Roop Matu ko adhika suhave, Daras karat jan ati sukh pave.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Tum sansar shakti laya kina, Palan hetu anna dhan dina.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Annapurna hui jag pala, Tumhi adi sundari Bala.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Pralaya kala sab nashan hari, Tum gauri Shiv-Shankar pyari.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Shiv yogi tumhre guna gaven, Brahma Vishnu tumhen nit dhyaven.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Roop Saraswati ko tum dhara, De subuddhi rishi munina ubara.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Dharyo roop Narsimha ko amba, Pragat bhayin phar kar khamba.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Raksha kari Prahlaad bachayo, Hiranakush ko swarga pathayo.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Lakshmi roop dharo jag mahin, Shree Narayan anga samihahin.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Ksheer sindhu men karat vilasa, Daya Sindhu, deeje man asa.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Hingalaja men tumhin Bhavani, Mahima amit na jet bakhani.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Matangi Dhoomavati Mata, Bhuvneshwari bagala sukhdata.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Shree Bhairav lara jog tarani, Chhinna Bhala bhav dukh nivarani.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Kehari Vahan soh Bhavani, Langur Veer Chalat agavani.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Kar men khappar khadag viraje, Jako dekh kal dan bhaje.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Sohe astra aur trishoola, Jase uthata shatru hiya shoola.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Nagarkot men tumhi virajat, Tihun lok men danka bajat.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Shumbhu Nishumbhu Danuja tum mare, Rakta-beeja shankhan samhare.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Mahishasur nripa ati abhimani, Jehi agha bhar mahi akulani.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Roop karal Kalika dhara, Sen Sahita tum tin samhara.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Pan garha Santan par jab jab, Bhayi sahaya Matu tum tab tab.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Amarpuni aru basava loka, Tava Mahirna sab rahen asoka.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Jwala men hai jyoti tumhari, Tumhen sada poojen nar nari.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Prem bhakti se Jo yash gave, Dukh-daridra nikat nahin ave.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Dhyave tumhen jo nar man laee, Janam-maran tako chuti jaee.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Jogi sur-muni kahat pukari, Jog na ho bin shakti tumhari.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Shankar Aacharaj tap keenhon, Kam, krodha jeet sab leenhon.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Nisidin dhyan dharo Shankar ko, Kahu kal nahini sumiro tum ko.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Shakti roop ko maran na payo, Shakti gayi tab man pachitayo.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Sharnagat hui keerti bakhani, Jai jai jai Jagdamb Bhavani.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Bhayi prasanna Aadi Jagdamba, Dayi shakti nahin keen vilamba.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Mokon Matu kashta ati ghero, Tum bin kaun hare dukh mero.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Aasha trishna nipat sataven, Moh madadik sab binsaven.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Shatru nash keeje Maharani, Sumiron ekachita tumhen Bhavani.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Karo kripa Hey Matu dayala, Riddhi-Siddhi de karahu nihala.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Jab lagi jiyoon daya phal paoon, Tumhro yash mein sada sunaoon.<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Durga Chalisa jo gave, Sab sukh bhog parampad pave.<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"56","post_id":"60","lang_id":"2","post_title":"Shree Parvati Mata Aarti ","post_desc":"

Jai Parvati Mata Jai Parvati Mata<\/span><\/p>\n

Brahma Sanatan Devi Shubh Fal Kada Data<\/span><\/p>\n

Arikul Pada Vinasin Jaisevak Trata<\/span><\/p>\n

Jag Jivan Jagdamba Harihar Gun Gata. Jai..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Singh Vahan Saajey Kundal Hai Saatha<\/span><\/p>\n

Dev Vadhu Jahan Gaavat Niratya Karat Tatha. Jai..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Satyug Sheel SuSundar Naam Sati Kahlata<\/span><\/p>\n

Hemachal Ghar Janmi Sakhiyan Rang Rata. Jai..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Shumbh Nishumh Vidaarey Hemachal Syata<\/span><\/p>\n

Sahas Bhuja Tanu Dharkey Chakra Liyu Hatha. Jai..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Shrishti Roop Tumhi Janini Shiv Sang Rang Rata<\/span><\/p>\n

Nandi Bhringibin Lahi Sara Mad Mata. Jai..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Devan Araj Karat Hum Chit ko Laata<\/span><\/p>\n

Gaavat De De Taali Man Mein Rang Raata Jai..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Shri Pratap Aarti Maiya Ki Jo Koi Gaata<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u092e\u0928\u094d\u0926<\/span> \u092c\u0941\u0926\u094d\u0927\u093f<\/span> \u0924\u0947<\/span> \u092c\u0941\u0927\u093f<\/span> \u092c\u0932<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0935\u0947\u0902\u0964<\/span> \u0930\u094b\u0917\u0940<\/span> \u0930\u094b\u0917<\/span> \u0930\u0939\u093f\u0924<\/span> \u0939\u094b<\/span> \u091c\u093e\u0935\u0947\u0902\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0926\u0930\u093f\u0926\u094d\u0930<\/span> \u092e\u093f\u091f\u0948<\/span> \u0915\u091f\u0948<\/span> \u0938\u092c<\/span> \u092a\u0940\u0930\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u0928\u093e\u0936\u0948<\/span> \u0926\u0941\u0903\u0916<\/span> \u0939\u0930\u0948<\/span> \u092d\u0935<\/span> \u092d\u0940\u0930\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0917\u0943\u0939<\/span> \u0915\u094d\u0932\u0947\u0936<\/span> \u091a\u093f\u0924<\/span> \u091a\u093f\u0928\u094d\u0924\u093e<\/span> \u092d\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u0928\u093e\u0938\u0948<\/span> \u0917\u093e\u092f\u0924\u094d\u0930\u0940<\/span> \u092d\u092f<\/span> \u0939\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0938\u0928\u094d\u0924\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u0939\u0940\u0928<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0938\u0928\u094d\u0924\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0935\u0947\u0902\u0964<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0916<\/span> \u0938\u0902\u092a\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u092f\u0941\u0924<\/span> \u092e\u094b\u0926<\/span> \u092e\u0928\u093e\u0935\u0947\u0902\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092d\u0942\u0924<\/span> \u092a\u093f\u0936\u093e\u091a<\/span> \u0938\u092c\u0948<\/span> \u092d\u092f<\/span> \u0916\u093e\u0935\u0947\u0902\u0964<\/span> \u092f\u092e<\/span> \u0915\u0947<\/span> \u0926\u0942\u0924<\/span> \u0928\u093f\u0915\u091f<\/span> \u0928\u0939\u093f\u0902<\/span> \u0906\u0935\u0947\u0902\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u094b<\/span> \u0938\u0927\u0935\u093e<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u092e\u093f\u0930\u0947\u0902<\/span> \u091a\u093f\u0924<\/span> \u0932\u093e\u0908\u0964<\/span> \u0905\u091b\u0924<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0939\u093e\u0917<\/span> \u0938\u0926\u093e<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0916\u0926\u093e\u0908\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0918\u0930<\/span> \u0935\u0930<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0916<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u0926<\/span> \u0932\u0939\u0948\u0902<\/span> \u0915\u0941\u092e\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u0927\u0935\u093e<\/span> \u0930\u0939\u0947\u0902<\/span> \u0938\u0924\u094d\u092f<\/span> \u0935\u094d\u0930\u0924<\/span> \u0927\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u092f\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u091c\u092f\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u091c\u0917\u0926\u092e\u094d\u092c<\/span> \u092d\u0935\u093e\u0928\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u0924\u0941\u092e<\/span> \u0938\u092e<\/span> \u0913\u0930<\/span> \u0926\u092f\u093e\u0932\u0941<\/span> \u0928<\/span> \u0926\u093e\u0928\u0940\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u094b<\/span> \u0938\u0924\u0917\u0941\u0930\u0941<\/span> \u0938\u094b<\/span> \u0926\u0940\u0915\u094d\u0937\u093e<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0935\u0947\u0964<\/span> \u0938\u094b<\/span> \u0938\u093e\u0927\u0928<\/span> \u0915\u094b<\/span> \u0938\u092b\u0932<\/span> \u092c\u0928\u093e\u0935\u0947\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0938\u0941\u092e\u093f\u0930\u0928<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0947<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0930\u0942\u091a\u093f<\/span> \u092c\u0921\u092d\u093e\u0917\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u0932\u0939\u0948<\/span> \u092e\u0928\u094b\u0930\u0925<\/span> \u0917\u0943\u0939\u0940<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u0930\u093e\u0917\u0940\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0917\u093e\u0935\u0928<\/span> \u0926\u0947<\/span> \u0926\u0947<\/span> \u0924\u093e\u0932\u0940<\/span> \u092e\u0928<\/span> \u092e\u0947\u0902<\/span> \u0930\u0902\u0917\u0930\u093e\u0924\u093e<\/span> \u0964\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u0924\u093e\u092a<\/span> \u0906\u0930\u0924\u0940<\/span> \u092e\u0948\u092f\u093e<\/span> \u0915\u0940<\/span> \u091c\u094b<\/span> \u0915\u094b\u0908<\/span> \u0917\u093e\u0924\u093e<\/span> ,<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u0938\u0926\u093e<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0916\u0940<\/span> \u0928\u093f\u0924<\/span> \u0930\u0939\u0924\u093e<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0916<\/span> \u0938\u092e\u094d\u092a\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0924\u093e<\/span> \u0964\u0964<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"59","post_id":"63","lang_id":"2","post_title":"Gayatri Chalisa","post_desc":"

Shri Gayatri Chalisa<\/strong><\/p>\n

DOHA:<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jayati Jayati Ambe Jayati, Jai Gayatri Devi.<\/p>\n

Brahamgyan Dhardhi Hridaya, Aadi Shakti Sur Devi.<\/p>\n

Jayati Jayati Gayatri Amba.<\/p>\n

Kathu Kasht Na Karoo Vilamba.<\/p>\n

Tab Dhyavat Vidhi Vishnu Mahesha.<\/p>\n

Lahat Agam Sukh Shanti Hamesha.<\/p>\n

Tuhijan Braham Gyan Ur Dharini.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jagtarini Bhav Mukti Prasarini;<\/p>\n

Jan Tan Sankat Nasan Haari;<\/p>\n

Hain Pishach Prait Dai Tari;<\/p>\n

Om Hrim, Shrim, Klim, Medha, Prabha, Jeevan, Jyoti, Prachand;<\/p>\n

Jag Kranti, Jagruti, Pragati, Rachana, Shakti Aakhand;<\/p>\n

Pranavo Savitri, Swadha, Swaha Puran Kaam;<\/p>\n

Shanti Janani, Mangal Karni, Gayatri Sukh Dham.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Om Bhoorbhuvahswah Om Yut Janani, Gayatri Nit Kalimal Dahani,<\/p>\n

Akshar Chaubis Param Puneeta, Inme Base Shastra Shuti Geeta;<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Shashwat Satoguni Satrupa, Satya Sanatan Sudha Anoopa,<\/p>\n

Hansarudh Swetambhar Dhari, Swarn Kranti Suchi Gagan Bihari.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Pustak Pushpa Kamdal Mala, Subhra Varna Tanu Nayan Vishala,<\/p>\n

Dhyan Dharat Pulkit Hit Hoi, Sukh Upjat Dukh Durmati Khoyi.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Kamdhenu Tum Sur Taru Chaya, Nirakar Ki Adhbut Maya,<\/p>\n

Tumhari Sharan Grahe Jab Koi, Tarai Shakat Sankat So Soi.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Saraswati Lakshmi tum Kali, Deepa Tumhari Jyoti Nirali,<\/p>\n

Tumhari Mahima Paar Na Pave, Jo Sharad Sutmukh Gun Gaven.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Char Ved Ki Matu Puneeta, Tum Brahmani Gauri Seeta,<\/p>\n

Mahamantra Jitne Jag Mahi, Kou Gayatri Sam Nahi.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Sumirat Hriday Mein Gyan Prakashe, Aalas Paap Avidhya Nase,<\/p>\n

Shristi Beej Jag Janani Bhavani, Kal Ratri Varda Kalyani.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Brahma Vishnu Rudru Sur Jete, Tum Sau Pave Surta tete,<\/p>\n

Tum Bhaktan Ki Bhakt Tumhare, Jananihin Putra Pran Te Pyare.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Mahima Aprampar Tumhari, Jai Jai Jai Tripada Bhayhari,<\/p>\n

Poorit Sakal Gyan Vigyana, Tum Sam Adhika Na Jag Mein Aana.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Tumahin Janu Kahu Rahe na shesha, Tumahin pae Kachu Rahne na Klesha;<\/p>\n

Janat Tumahin Tumahin Hihe Jai, Paras Parsi Kudhatu Suhai.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Tumhari Shakti deepe Sab Thai, Mata Tum Sab Thor Samai,<\/p>\n

Graha Nakshtra Brahmand Ghenere, Tun Gativan Tunhare Prere.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Sakal Shriti Ki Pran Vidhata, Palak Poshak Nasak Trata,<\/p>\n

Mateshwari Daya Vrat Dhari, Tun San Tare Patki Bhari.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Japar Kripa Tumari Hoi, Ta Par Kripa Kare Sab Koi,<\/p>\n

Mand Buddhi te Buddhi Bal Paven, Rogi Rog Rahit Ho Javen,<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Daridra Mite Kate Sab Peera, Nashe Dukh Hare Bhav Peera,<\/p>\n

Griha Kalesh Chit Chinta Bhari, Nase Gayatri Bhav Hari.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Santati Hin Su Santati Pave, Sukh Sampati Yut Mod Manave,<\/p>\n

Bhoot Pishah Sab Bhay Khave, Yam Ke Doot Nikat Nahi Aave.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jo Sadhva Sumre Chit Lai, Achhat Suhag Sada Sukhdai,<\/p>\n

Ghar Var Shukhprad Rahe Kumari, Vidhva Rahe Satyavrat Dhari.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jayati Jayati Jagdamba Bhawani, Tum Sab Aur Dayalu Na Dani,<\/p>\n

Jo Sadguru So Diksha Pave, So Sadhan Ko Saphal Banave.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Sumiran Kare Suruchi Badbhagi, Lahen manorath Grahi Viragi,<\/p>\n

Astha Siddhi Nav Nidhi Ki Data, Sab Samarath Gayatri Mata.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Rishi Muni Yati, Tapasvi, Jogi, Arat Arthi Chintit Bhogi,<\/p>\n

Jo Jo Sharan Tumari Aave, So So Manvanchit Phal Paven.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Bal Buddhi Vidya Sheel Swabhaav, Dhan Vaibhav Yash Tej Uchaau,<\/p>\n

Sakal Badhe Upje Sukh Nana, Jo Yah Path Kare Dhari Dhayana.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

DOHA:<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Yeh Chalisa Bhakti Yut Path Kare Jo Koi,<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Ta Par Kripa Prasanta,  Gayatri Ki Hoi<\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"60","post_id":"64","lang_id":"2","post_title":"Shree Radha-Krishna Aarti ","post_desc":"

Om Jai Shree Radha Jai Shree Krishna<\/span><\/p>\n

Shree Radha Krishnayah Namah II<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Ghoom Ghumro Ghamar Sohay Jai Shree Radha<\/span><\/p>\n

Pat Pitambar Muni Mann Mohay Jai Shree Krishna I<\/span><\/p>\n

Jugal Prem Ras Jham Jham Jhamke<\/span><\/p>\n

Shree Radha Krishnayah Namah II<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Radha Radha krishna Kanhiya Jai Shree Radha<\/span><\/p>\n

Bhav Bhav Sagar Paar Lagaya Jai Shree Krishna I<\/span><\/p>\n

Mangal Murthi Mooksh Karaya<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u0965<\/span>Doha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Maatu Lakshmi Kari Kripa, Karo Hridaya Mein Vaas\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Manokamna Siddha Kari, Paruvahu Meri Aas\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0965<\/span>Soratha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Yahi Mor Ardas, Hath Jod Vinati karun\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Sab Vidhi Karau Suvas, Jai Janani Jagadambika\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0965<\/span>Chaupai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Sindu Suta Main Sumirau Tohi\u0964<\/span> Gyan, Buddhi, Vidya Do Mohi\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Tum Samaan Nahi Koi Upkari\u0964<\/span> Sab Vidhi Puravahu Aas Hamari\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Jai Jagat Janani Jagadamba\u0964<\/span> Sabaki Tum Hi Ho Avalamba\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Tum Hi Ho Sab Ghat Ghat Vaasi\u0964<\/span> Vinati Yahi Hamari Khaasi\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jagajanani Jai Sindhu Kumari\u0964<\/span> Dinan ki Tum Ho Hitakari\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Vinavaun Nitya Tumahin Maharani\u0964<\/span> Kripa Karau Jaga Janani Bhavani\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Kehi Vidhi Stuti Karaun Tihari\u0964<\/span> Sudhi Lijai Aparadh Bisari\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Kripa Drishti Chitavavo Mam Ori\u0964<\/span> Jaga Janani Vinati Sun Mori\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Gyan Buddhi Jai Sukh Ki Data\u0964<\/span> Sankat Haro Hamari Mata\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Kshirasindhu Jab Vishnu Mathayo\u0964<\/span> Chaudah Ratna Sindhu Mein Payo\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Chaudah Ratna Mein Tum Sukharasi\u0964<\/span> Seva Kiyo Prabu Bani Dasi\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jab Jab Janma Jahan Prabhu Linha\u0964<\/span> Roop Badal Tahan Seva Kinha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Svayan Vishnu Jab Nar Tanu Dhara\u0964<\/span> Linheu Avadhapuri Avatara\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Tab Tum Pragat Janakapur Mahin\u0964<\/span> Seva Kiyo Hridaya Pulakahin\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Apanaya Tohi Antaryami\u0964<\/span> Vishva Vidit Tribhuvan Ki Swami\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Tum Sam Prabal Shakti Nahin Aani\u0964<\/span> Kahan Lau Mahima Kahaun Bakhani\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Man Kram Vachan Karai Sevakai\u0964<\/span> Man Ichchhita Vanchhit Phal Pai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Taji Chhal Kapat Aur Chaturai\u0964<\/span> Pujahin Vividh Bhanti Man Lai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Aur Haal Main Kahaun Bujhai\u0964<\/span> Jo Yah Paath Karai Man Lai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Tako Koi Kashta Noi\u0964<\/span> Man Ichchhita Pavai Phal Soi\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Trahi Trahi Jai Dukh Nivarini\u0964<\/span> Trividh Taap Bhav Bandhan Harini\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jo Chalisa Pade Padave\u0964<\/span> Dhyana Lagakar Sunai Sunavai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Takau Koi Na Rog Satavai\u0964<\/span> Putra Aadi Dhan Sampatti Pavai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Putrahin Aru Sampatti Hina\u0964<\/span> Andh Badhir Kodhi Ati Dina\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Vipra Bolaya Kai Paath Karavai\u0964<\/span> Shanka Dil Mein Kabhi Na Lavai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Paath Karavai Din Chalisa\u0964<\/span> Ta Par Kripa Karain Gaurisa\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Sukh Sampatti Bahut Si Pavai\u0964<\/span> Kami Nahin Kaahu Ki Avai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Barah Maas Karai Jo Puja\u0964<\/span> Tehi Sam Dhanya Aur Nahin Duja\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Pratidin Paath Karai Man Mahin\u0964<\/span> Un Sam Koi Jag Mein Kahun Naahin\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Bahuvidhi Kya Mai Karaun Badai\u0964<\/span> Leya Pariksha Dhyana Lagai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Kari Vishvas Karai Vrat Nema\u0964<\/span> Hoy Siddha Upajai Ur Prema\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Jai Jai Lakshmi Bhavani\u0964<\/span> Sab Mein Vyapita Ho Gun Khaani\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Tumharo Tej Prabal Jag Mahin\u0964<\/span> Tum Sam Kou Dayalu Kahun Naahin\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Mohi Anath Ki Sudhi Ab Lijai\u0964<\/span> Sankat Kaati Bhakti Mohi Dijai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Bhul Chuk Kari Kshama Hamari\u0964<\/span> Darshan Dajai Dasha Nihari\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Bin Darshan Vyakul Adhikari\u0964<\/span> Tumahi Achhat Dukh Sahate Bhaari\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Nahin Mohin Gyan Buddhi Hai Tan Mein\u0964<\/span> Sab Janat Ho Apane Man Mein\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Roop Chaturbhuja Karake Dharan\u0964<\/span> Kashta Mor Ab Karahu Nivaran\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Kehi Prakar Main Karaun Badai\u0964<\/span> Gyan Buddhi Mohin Nahin Adhikai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0965<\/span>Doha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Trahi Trahi Dukh Harini, Haro Vegi Sab Tras\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Jayati Jayati Jai Lakshmi, Karo Shatru Ko Naash\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Ramdas Dhari Dhyan Nit, Vinay Karat Kar Jor\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Santoshi mata, maya Jai Santoshi mata,<\/span><\/p>\n

Apne sevak jan ki, sukh sampati data,<\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Santoshi mata....<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Sundar chir sunahri, man dharan kinhon,<\/span><\/p>\n

Hira Pana damke, tan shringar liyo, <\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Santoshi mata....<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Geru lal chhata chhavi, badan kamal sohe <\/span><\/p>\n

Mand hansat karunamayi, Tribhuvan man mohe, <\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Santoshi mata....<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Svarna sinhasan baithi, chanvar dhure pyare,<\/span><\/p>\n

dhup, dip, madhu meva, bhog dhare nyare, <\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Santoshi mata....<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Gud aur chana param priya, tamen santosh kiyo,<\/span><\/p>\n

Santoshi kahlai, bhaktan vaibhav diyo,<\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Santoshi mata....<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Shukravar priya manat, aj divas sohi,<\/span><\/p>\n

Bhakti mandali chhai, katha sunat mohi, <\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Santoshi mata....<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Mandir jag mag jyoti, mangal dhvani chhai,<\/span><\/p>\n

Vinai kare tere balak, charnan sir nai, <\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Santoshi mata....<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Bhakti bhavmai puja angikrit kijai,<\/span><\/p>\n

Jo man vasai hamare ichha phal dijai, <\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Santoshi mata....<\/span><\/p>\n

Dhyan dharo jan tero manvanchhit phal payo,<\/span><\/p>\n

Puja katha shravan kar ghar anand ayo,<\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Santoshi mata.<\/span><\/p>\n

Sharan gahe ki, laja rakhiyo Jagdambe,<\/span><\/p>\n

Sankat tu hi nivare, dayamayi Ambe,<\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Santoshi mata....<\/span><\/p>\n

Santoshi man ki aarti jo koi jan gavai,<\/span><\/p>\n

Riddhi-Siddhi sukh sampati, ji bhar ke pavai,<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0924\u092c<\/span> \u0924\u0941\u092e<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u0917\u091f<\/span> \u091c\u0928\u0915\u092a\u0941\u0930<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0939\u0940\u0902\u0964<\/span> \u0938\u0947\u0935\u093e<\/span> \u0915\u093f\u092f\u094b<\/span> \u0939\u0943\u0926\u092f<\/span> \u092a\u0941\u0932\u0915\u093e\u0939\u0940\u0902\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0915\u0947\u0939\u093f<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u0915\u093e\u0930<\/span> \u092e\u0948\u0902<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u094c\u0902<\/span> \u092c\u0921\u093c\u093e\u0908\u0964<\/span> \u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0928<\/span> \u092c\u0941\u0926\u094d\u0927\u093f<\/span> \u092e\u094b\u0939\u093f<\/span> \u0928\u0939\u093f\u0902<\/span> \u0905\u0927\u093f\u0915\u093e\u0908\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0924\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0939\u093f<\/span> \u0924\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0939\u093f<\/span> \u0926\u0941\u0903\u0916<\/span> \u0939\u093e\u0930\u093f\u0923\u0940<\/span>, \u0939\u0930\u094b<\/span> \u0935\u0947\u0917\u093f<\/span> \u0938\u092c<\/span> \u0924\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0938\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u092f\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u091c\u092f\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u091c\u092f<\/span> \u0932\u0915\u094d\u0937\u094d\u092e\u0940<\/span>, \u0915\u0930\u094b<\/span> \u0936\u0924\u094d\u0930\u0941<\/span> \u0915\u094b<\/span> \u0928\u093e\u0936\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0930\u093e\u092e\u0926\u093e\u0938<\/span> \u0927\u0930\u093f<\/span> \u0927\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0928<\/span> \u0928\u093f\u0924<\/span>, \u0935\u093f\u0928\u092f<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0924<\/span> \u0915\u0930<\/span> \u091c\u094b\u0930\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092e\u093e\u0924\u0941<\/span> \u0932\u0915\u094d\u0937\u094d\u092e\u0940<\/span> \u0926\u093e\u0938<\/span> \u092a\u0930<\/span>, \u0915\u0930\u0939\u0941<\/span> \u0926\u092f\u093e<\/span> \u0915\u0940<\/span> \u0915\u094b\u0930\u0965<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"65","post_id":"69","lang_id":"1","post_title":"\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940 \u0938\u0902\u0924\u094b\u0937\u0940 \u092e\u093e\u0924\u093e \u091c\u0940 \u0915\u0940 \u0906\u0930\u0924\u0940","post_desc":"

\u091c\u092f<\/span> \u0938\u0902\u0924\u094b\u0937\u0940<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0924\u093e<\/span>, \u092e\u0948\u092f\u093e<\/span> \u091c\u092f<\/span> \u0938\u0902\u0924\u094b\u0937\u0940<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0924\u093e<\/span> \u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0905\u092a\u0928\u0947<\/span> \u0938\u0947\u0935\u0915<\/span> \u091c\u0928<\/span> \u0915\u094b<\/span>, \u0938\u0941\u0916<\/span> \u0938\u0902\u092a\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u0926\u093e\u0924\u093e<\/span> \u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u092f<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0902\u0926\u0930<\/span> \u091a\u0940\u0930<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0928\u0939\u0930\u0940<\/span>, \u092e\u093e\u0902<\/span> \u0927\u093e\u0930\u0923<\/span> \u0915\u0940\u0928\u094d\u0939\u094b<\/span> \u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0939\u0940\u0930\u093e<\/span> \u092a\u0928\u094d\u0928\u093e<\/span> \u0926\u092e\u0915\u0947<\/span>, \u0924\u0928<\/span> \u0936\u094d\u0930\u0943\u0902\u0917\u093e\u0930<\/span> \u0932\u0940\u0928\u094d\u0939\u094b<\/span> \u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u092f<\/span> \u0917\u0947\u0930\u0942<\/span> \u0932\u093e\u0932<\/span> \u091b\u091f\u093e<\/span> \u091b\u0935\u093f<\/span>, \u092c\u0926\u0928<\/span> \u0915\u092e\u0932<\/span> \u0938\u094b\u0939\u0947<\/span> \u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092e\u0902\u0926<\/span> \u0939\u0901\u0938\u0924<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0942\u0923\u093e\u092e\u092f\u0940<\/span>, \u0924\u094d\u0930\u093f\u092d\u0941\u0935\u0928<\/span> \u091c\u0928<\/span> \u092e\u094b\u0939\u0947<\/span> \u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u092f<\/span> \u0938\u094d\u0935\u0930\u094d\u0923<\/span> \u0938\u093f\u0902\u0939\u093e\u0938\u0928<\/span> \u092c\u0948\u0920\u0940<\/span>, \u091a\u0902\u0935\u0930<\/span> \u0922\u0941\u0930\u0947<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0930\u0947<\/span> \u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0927\u0942\u092a<\/span>, \u0926\u0940\u092a<\/span>, \u092e\u0927\u0941\u092e\u0947\u0935\u093e<\/span>, \u092d\u094b\u0917<\/span> \u0927\u0930\u0947\u0902<\/span> \u0928\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0930\u0947<\/span> \u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u091c\u092f<\/span> \u0917\u0941\u095c<\/span> \u0905\u0930\u0941<\/span> \u091a\u0928\u093e<\/span> \u092a\u0930\u092e\u092a\u094d\u0930\u093f\u092f<\/span>, \u0924\u093e\u092e\u0947<\/span> \u0938\u0902\u0924\u094b\u0937<\/span> \u0915\u093f\u092f\u094b\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092e\u093e\u0924\u0941<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u092d\u0935\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u0927\u0928\u093f<\/span> \u092e\u0902\u0926\u093e\u0915\u093f\u0928\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u0927\u0928\u093f<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0930<\/span> \u0938\u0930\u093f\u0924<\/span> \u0938\u0915\u0932<\/span> \u092d\u092f\u0928\u093e\u0938\u093f\u0928\u0940\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092a\u0928<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0924<\/span> \u0928\u093f\u0930\u094d\u092e\u0932<\/span> \u0917\u0902\u0917\u093e<\/span> \u091c\u0932\u0964<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0935\u0924<\/span> \u092e\u0928<\/span> \u0907\u091a\u094d\u091b\u093f\u0924<\/span> \u0905\u0928\u0902\u0924<\/span> \u092b\u0932\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092a\u0941\u0930\u0935<\/span> \u091c\u0928\u094d\u092e<\/span> \u092a\u0941\u0923\u094d\u092f<\/span> \u091c\u092c<\/span> \u091c\u093e\u0917\u0924\u0964<\/span> \u0924\u092c\u0939\u0940\u0902<\/span> \u0927\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0928<\/span> \u0917\u0902\u0917\u093e<\/span> \u092e\u0939\u0902<\/span> \u0932\u093e\u0917\u0924\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u0908<\/span> \u092a\u0917\u0941<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0930\u0938\u0930\u0940<\/span> \u0939\u0947\u0924\u0941<\/span> \u0909\u0920\u093e\u0935\u0939\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u0924\u0908<\/span> \u091c\u0917\u093f<\/span> \u0905\u0936\u094d\u0935\u092e\u0947\u0918<\/span> \u092b\u0932<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0935\u0939\u093f\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092e\u0939\u093e<\/span> \u092a\u0924\u093f\u0924<\/span> \u091c\u093f\u0928<\/span> \u0915\u0939\u0942<\/span> \u0928<\/span> \u0924\u093e\u0930\u0947\u0964<\/span> \u0924\u093f\u0928<\/span> \u0924\u093e\u0930\u0947<\/span> \u0907\u0915<\/span> \u0928\u093e\u092e<\/span> \u0924\u093f\u0939\u093e\u0930\u0947\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0936\u0924<\/span> \u092f\u094b\u091c\u0928<\/span> \u0939\u0942\u0902<\/span> \u0938\u0947<\/span> \u091c\u094b<\/span> \u0927\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0935\u0939\u093f\u0902\u0964<\/span> \u0928\u093f\u0936\u091a\u093e\u0908<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u0937\u094d\u0923\u0941<\/span> \u0932\u094b\u0915<\/span> \u092a\u0926<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0935\u0939\u0940\u0902\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0928\u093e\u092e<\/span> \u092d\u091c\u0924<\/span> \u0905\u0917\u0923\u093f\u0924<\/span> \u0905\u0918<\/span> \u0928\u093e\u0936\u0948\u0964<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u092e\u0932<\/span> \u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0928<\/span> \u092c\u0932<\/span> \u092c\u0941\u0926\u094d\u0927\u093f<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u0915\u093e\u0936\u0947\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u093f\u092e\u0940<\/span> \u0927\u0928<\/span> \u092e\u0942\u0932<\/span> \u0927\u0930\u094d\u092e\u0902<\/span> \u0905\u0930\u0941<\/span> \u0926\u093e\u0928\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u0927\u0930\u094d\u092e\u0902<\/span> \u092e\u0942\u0932<\/span> \u0917\u0902\u0917\u093e\u091c\u0932<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0928\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0924\u092c<\/span> \u0917\u0941\u0928<\/span> \u0917\u0941\u0923\u0928<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0924<\/span> \u0926\u0941\u0916<\/span> \u092d\u093e\u091c\u0924\u0964<\/span> \u0917\u0943\u0939<\/span> \u0917\u0943\u0939<\/span> \u0938\u092e\u094d\u092a\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u092e\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u0930\u093e\u091c\u0924\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0928\u093f\u0924<\/span> \u0928\u090f<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0916<\/span> \u0938\u092e\u094d\u092a\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u0932\u0939\u0948\u0902\u0964<\/span> \u0927\u0930\u0947\u0902<\/span> \u0917\u0902\u0917\u093e<\/span> \u0915\u093e<\/span> \u0927\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0928\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0905\u0902\u0924<\/span> \u0938\u092e\u093e\u0908<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0930<\/span> \u092a\u0941\u0930<\/span> \u092c\u0938\u0932\u0964<\/span> \u0938\u0926\u0930<\/span> \u092c\u0948\u0920\u0940<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u092e\u093e\u0928\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0938\u0902\u0935\u0924<\/span> \u092d\u0941\u0924<\/span> \u0928\u092d\u094d\u0926\u093f\u0936\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u0930\u093e\u092e<\/span> \u091c\u0928\u094d\u092e<\/span> \u0926\u093f\u0928<\/span> \u091a\u0948\u0924\u094d\u0930\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u092a\u0942\u0930\u0923<\/span> \u091a\u093e\u0932\u0940\u0938\u093e<\/span> \u0915\u093f\u092f\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u0939\u0930\u0940<\/span> \u092d\u0915\u094d\u0924\u0928<\/span> \u0939\u093f\u0924<\/span> \u0928\u0947\u0924\u094d\u0930\u0965<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"67","post_id":"71","lang_id":"2","post_title":"SANTOSHI MATA AARTI.","post_desc":"

Jai Santhoshi maa, Maiya Jai Santhoshi Mata,<\/p>\n

Apne sevaka jana ki sukha sampathi datha...<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Victory to Santhoshi Mata, my mother Santhoshi Mata,<\/p>\n

Who blesses her devotees with joy and wealth.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Sundara cheer sunahari, maan dharana keenho,<\/p>\n

Hira paana dhamke, tana shringar leenho...<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

You are well dressed oh mother, with golden garments,<\/p>\n

And bedecked with shining emeralds and diamonds.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Geru Laal chata chavi, badan kamal sohe,<\/p>\n

Manda hamsath karunamayi, tribhuvan man mohe...<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Oh merciful mother, the reddish tinge in your face<\/p>\n

Makes it look like a lotus flower,<\/p>\n

And your smile enchants the three worlds.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Suvarna simhasana baithi, chanvara duare pyare,<\/p>\n

Dhuupa dhipa madshu meva mogh dhare nyare...<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

You are seated on a golden throne,<\/p>\n

With a devotee fanning you with love,<\/p>\n

With incense and lamps shown before you,<\/p>\n

And honey and dry fruits are lying before you.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Gur aur chana paramapriya thamen santhosh kiyo,<\/p>\n

Santhoshi kahlaii, bhakthana vaibhava diyo...<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jaggery and gram are your favorites,<\/p>\n

Which satisfy and make you happy,<\/p>\n

And you being incarnation of happiness,<\/p>\n

Would bless your devotees with affluence.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Shukra vara priya manath, aaj divasa sohi,<\/p>\n

Bhaktha mandali chahi, katha sunatha mohi...<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

You consider Friday as your most liked day,<\/p>\n

And today also happens to be Friday,<\/p>\n

And your devotees have assembled here,<\/p>\n

With desire to hear your story.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Mandira jagamaga jyothi, mangala dwani chaaii,<\/p>\n

Vinaya kare there balaka charana sira naaii...<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Your temple lights are glittering and sparkling,<\/p>\n

The sound coming from there is auspicious<\/p>\n

And your children are bowing their heads,<\/p>\n

And paying homage to your feet.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Bhakthi bhavamayee pooja angikrutha kee jai,<\/p>\n

Bahu dhana dhanya bhare ghar sukha saubhagya diye...<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Please approve our worship,<\/p>\n

Which is done with devotion,<\/p>\n

And give us a house full of,<\/p>\n

Grains, wealth, pleasure and luck.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Dhyana dharo tero mana vanchitha phala payo,<\/p>\n

Puja katha shravana kara, gara anand aayo...<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

He who meditated upon you,<\/p>\n

Got all that he desired,<\/p>\n

Please fill our homes with happiness,<\/p>\n

By our doing worship and hearing your story,<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Sharana gahe kilaja rakhiyo jagadambe,<\/p>\n

Sankata thu hee nivare daya mayi ambe...<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Oh mother of the universe,<\/p>\n

Honour him who seeks your refuge,<\/p>\n

And cure him of all his sorrow,<\/p>\n

Oh mother who is full of mercy.<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Santhoshi maa ki aarth, jo oijana gavai,<\/p>\n

Ridhi sidhi suka sampathi, ji bhar ke pavai...<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

He who sings with devotion,<\/p>\n

This aarthi of Santhoshi mata,<\/p>\n

Would get to his hearts content,<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Prosperity, achievement, happiness and wealth...<\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"68","post_id":"72","lang_id":"2","post_title":"Ganga Chalisa","post_desc":"

Shree Ganga Chalisa<\/strong><\/p>\n

DOHA:<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jai jai jai jag pavani, jayati devasari Ganga,<\/p>\n

Jai Shiv jata nivasini, anupam tung taranga<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jai jai janani harana aghkhani, anand karani Ganga Maharani<\/p>\n

Jai Bhagirath surasuri mata, kalimal mul dalani nikhyata<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jai Jai jahanu suta agh hanani, Bhishma ki mata jaga janani<\/p>\n

Dhaval kamal dal mam tanu saje, lakhi shat sharad chandra chhavi lajai<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Vahan makar vimal shuchi sohain, amiya kalash kar lakhi man mohain<\/p>\n

Jadita ratna kanchan abhushan, hiya mani har, haranitam dushan<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jag pavani traya tap nasavani, taral tarang tunga mana bhavani<\/p>\n

Jo Ganapati ati pujya pradhana, ihun te pratham Ganga asnana<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Brahma kamandal vasini devi, Shri Prabhu pad pankaj sukh sevi<\/p>\n

Sathi sahastra Sagar sut taryo, Ganga sagar tirth dharyo<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Agam tarang uthyo man bhavan, lakhi tirth Haridvar suhavan<\/p>\n

Tirth raj prayag Akshaiveta, dharyo matu puni kashi karvat<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Dhani dhani surasari svarga ki sidhi, tarani amita pitu pad pirhi<\/p>\n

Bhagirathi tap kiyo upara, diyo Brahma tava surasari dhara<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jaba jag jagani chalyo haharai, Shambhu jata mahon rahyo samai<\/p>\n

Barsha paryant Ganga Maharani, rahin shambhu ke jata bhulani<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Puni Bhagirathi shambhuhin dhyayo, taba ika band jata se payo<\/p>\n

Tate matu bhain traya dhara, mrityu lok, nabha, aru patara<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Gain patal Prabhavati, nama, Mandakini gai gagan lelama<\/p>\n

Mrityu lok jahnavi suhavani, kalimal harani agam jag pa vani<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Dhani maiya tab mahima bhari, dharma dhuri kali kalush kuthari<\/p>\n

Matu Prabhavati Dhani Mandakini, dhani sur sarith sakal bhainasini<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Pan karat nirmal Ganga jal, pavat man ichchhit anant phal<\/p>\n

Purva janma punya jaba jagat, tabahin dhyan Ganga mahan lagat<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jai pagu sursari hetu uthavahi, tai jagi ashva megha phal pavahi<\/p>\n

Maha patit jin kahu na tare, tin tare ik nam tihare<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Shat yojanahun se jo dhyavahin, nishchai vishnu lok pad pavahin<\/p>\n

Nam bhajat aganit agh na shai, vimal gyan bal budhi prakashai<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jimi dhan mula dharma aru dana, dharma mula Ganga jal pana<\/p>\n

Taba gun gunan karat dukh bhajat, griha griha smapati sumati virajat<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Gangahi nem sahit nit dhyavat, duraj nahun sajjan pad pavat<\/p>\n

Buddihin vidhya bal pavai, rogi rog mukta hvai javai<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Ganga Ganga jo nara kahahin, bhukha nanga kabhuhuh na rahahi<\/p>\n

Niksat hi mukh Ganga mahi, shravana dabi Yama chalahin parai<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Mahan aghin adhman kahan tare, bhae narka ke bande kivaren<\/p>\n

Jo nar japai Ganga shat nama, sakal siddhi puran hvai kama<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Sab sukh bhog param pad pavahir, avagaman rahit hvai javahin<\/p>\n

Dhani maiya surasari sukhdaini, dhani dhani tirath raj Tniveni<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Kakara gram rishi Durvasa, Sundardas Gang kar dasa<\/p>\n

Jo yah padhe Ganga chalisa, milai bhakti aviral vagisa<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

DOHA:<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Nit nay sukh sampati Iahain, dharen ganga ka dhyan<\/p>\n

Anta samai sur pur basai, saadar baithi viman<\/p>\n

Samvat bhuj nabhdishi,ram janam din chaitra<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Puran Chalisa kiya, Hari bhaktan hit naitra.<\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"69","post_id":"73","lang_id":"1","post_title":"\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940 \u092d\u0948\u0930\u0935 \u0906\u0930\u0924\u0940","post_desc":"

\u091c\u092f<\/span> \u092d\u0948\u0930\u0935<\/span> \u0926\u0947\u0935\u093e<\/span>, \u092a\u094d\u0930\u092d\u0941<\/span> \u091c\u092f<\/span> \u092d\u0948\u0930\u0935<\/span> \u0926\u0947\u0935\u093e<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u092f<\/span> \u0915\u093e\u0932\u0940<\/span> \u0914\u0930<\/span> \u0917\u094c\u0930<\/span> \u0926\u0947\u0935\u0940<\/span> \u0915\u0943\u0924<\/span> \u0938\u0947\u0935\u093e<\/span> || \u091c\u092f<\/span> \u092d\u0948\u0930\u0935<\/span> ||<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u0915\u0939\u0947<\/span> \u0927\u0930\u0928\u0940<\/span> \u0927\u0930<\/span> \u0928\u0930<\/span> \u092e\u0928\u0935\u093e\u0902\u091b\u093f\u0924<\/span> \u092b\u0932<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0935\u0947<\/span> || \u091c\u092f<\/span> \u092d\u0948\u0930\u0935<\/span> ||<\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"70","post_id":"74","lang_id":"2","post_title":"SHRI BHAIRAV JI KI AARTI","post_desc":"

Jai Bhairav Deva, Prabhu Jai Bhairav Deva,<\/p>\n

Jai Kaali Aur Gaura Devi Krit Sevaa || Jai Bhairav ||<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Tunhi Paap Udhaarak Dukh Sindhu Taarak<\/p>\n

Bhakto Ke Sukh Kaarak Bhishan Vapu Dhaarak || Jai Bhairav ||<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Vaahan Swan Viraajat Kar Trishul Dhari<\/p>\n

Mahimaa Amit Tumhari Jai Jai Bhaye Haari || Jai Bhairav ||<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Tum Bin Devaa Sevaa Safal Nahi Hove<\/p>\n

Chaumukh Deepak Darshan Dukh Khove || Jai Bhairav ||<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Tel Chatki Dadhi Mishrit Bhaashaavali Teri<\/p>\n

Kripa Kijiye Bhairav Kariye Nahi Derii || Jai Bhairav ||<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Paav Ghunghroo Baajat Aru Dhamroo Dhamkavat<\/p>\n

Batkunaath Ban Baalakjan Mann Harshavat || Jai Bhairav ||<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Batkunaath Ki Aarti Jo Koi Nar Gaave<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u0965<\/span>Doha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Janaka Janani Pada Kamal Raj, Nija Mastaka Para Dhari\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Bandaun Matu Saraswati, Buddhi Bala De Datari\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Purna Jagat Mein Vyapta Tava, Mahima Amit Anantu\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Ramsagar Ke Papa Ko, Matu Tuhi Ab Hantu\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0965<\/span>Chaupai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Shri Sakal Buddhi Balarasi\u0964<\/span> Jai Sarvagya Amar Avinasi\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Jai Jai Veenakar Dhari\u0964<\/span> Karati Sada Suhansa Savari\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Roopa Chaturbhujadhari Mata\u0964<\/span> Sakal Vishva Andar Vikhyata\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jaga Mein Pap Buddhi Jab Hoti\u0964<\/span> Jabahi Dharma Ki Phiki Jyoti\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Tabahi Matu Le Nija Avatara\u0964<\/span> Pap Heen Karati Mahi Tara\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Balmiki Ji The Baham Gyani\u0964<\/span> Tava Prasad Janai Sansara\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Ramayan Jo Rache Banai\u0964<\/span> Adi Kavi Ki Padavi Pai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Kalidas Jo Bhaye Vikhyata\u0964<\/span> Teri Kripa Drishti Se Mata\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Tulasi Sur Adi Vidvana\u0964<\/span> Bhaye Aur Jo Gyani Nana\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Tinhahi Na Aur Raheu Avalamba\u0964<\/span> Keval Kripa Apaki Amba\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Karahu Kripa Soi Matu Bhavani\u0964<\/span> Dukhita Dina Nija Dasahi Jani\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Putra Karai Aparadha Bahuta\u0964<\/span> Tehi Na Dharai Chita Sundara Mata\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Main Anath Teri Avalamba\u0964<\/span> Kripa Karau Jai Jai Jagadamba\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Madhu Kaitabh Jo Ati Balavana\u0964<\/span> Bahuyuddha Vishnu Te Thana\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Samara Hajara Panch Mein Ghora\u0964<\/span> Phir Bhi Mukha Unase Nahi Mora\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Matu Sahay Bhai Tehi Kala\u0964<\/span> Buddhi Viparita Kari Khalahala\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Tehi Te Mrityu Bhai Khala Keri\u0964<\/span> Purvahu Matu Manoratha Meri\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Chanda Munda Jo The Vikhyata\u0964<\/span> Chhana Mahu Sanhareu Tehi Mata\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Raktabij Se Samarath Papi\u0964<\/span> Sur-Muni Hridaya Dhara Saba Kampi\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Kateu Sira Jima Kadali Khamba\u0964<\/span> Bara Bara Binavau Jagadamba\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jaga Prasiddha Jo Shumbha Nishumbha\u0964<\/span> Chhina Mein Badhe Tahi Tu Amba\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Bharata-Matu Budhi Phereu Jayi\u0964<\/span> Ramachandra Banvasa Karai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Ehi Vidhi Ravana Vadha Tum Kinha\u0964<\/span> Sura Nara Muni Saba Kahun Sukha Dinha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Ko Samarath Tava Yasha Guna Gana\u0964<\/span> Nigama Anadi Ananta Bakhana\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Vishnu Rudra Aja Sakahin Na Mari\u0964<\/span> Jinaki Ho Tum Rakshakari\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Rakta Dantika Aur Shatakshi\u0964<\/span> Nama Apar Hai Danava Bhakshi\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Durgam Kaj Dhara Para Kinha\u0964<\/span> Durga Nama Sakala Jaga Linha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Durg Adi Harani Tu Mata\u0964<\/span> Kripa Karahu Jab Jab Sukhadata\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Nripa Kopita Jo Marana Chahai\u0964<\/span> Kanan Mein Ghere Mriga Nahai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Sagara Madhya Pota Ke Bhange\u0964<\/span> Ati Toofana Nahi Kou Sange\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Bhoota Preta Badha Ya Dukha Mein\u0964<\/span> Ho Daridra Athava Sankata Mein\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Putrahin Jo Atur Bhai\u0964<\/span> Sabai Chhandi Puje Ehi Mai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Karai Patha Nita Yaha Chalisa\u0964<\/span> Hoya Putra Sundara Guna Isa\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Dhupadika Naivedya Chadhavai\u0964<\/span> Sankata Rahita Avashya Ho Javai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Bhakti Matu Ki Karai Hamesha\u0964<\/span> Nikata Na Avai Tahi Kalesha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Bandi Patha Karein Shata Bara\u0964<\/span> Bandi Pasha Dura Ho Sara\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Mata Suraj Kanti Tava, Andhakara Mam Roopa\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Bala Buddhi Vidya Dehu Mohi, Sunahu Saraswati Matu\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092c\u0902\u0926\u0940<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0920<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0947\u0902<\/span> \u0936\u0924<\/span> \u092c\u093e\u0930\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u092c\u0902\u0926\u0940<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0936<\/span> \u0926\u0942\u0930<\/span> \u0939\u094b<\/span> \u0938\u093e\u0930\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0915\u0930\u0939\u0941<\/span> \u0915\u0943\u092a\u093e<\/span> \u092d\u0935\u092e\u0941\u0915\u094d\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u092d\u0935\u093e\u0928\u0940\u0964<\/span> \u092e\u094b<\/span> \u0915\u0939\u0902<\/span> \u0926\u093e\u0938<\/span> \u0938\u0926\u093e<\/span> \u0928\u093f\u091c<\/span> \u091c\u093e\u0928\u0940\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0965\u0926\u094b\u0939\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092e\u093e\u0924\u093e<\/span> \u0938\u0942\u0930\u091c<\/span> \u0915\u093e\u0928\u094d\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u0924\u0935<\/span>, \u0905\u0902\u0927\u0915\u093e\u0930<\/span> \u092e\u092e<\/span> \u0930\u0942\u092a\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0921\u0942\u092c\u0928<\/span> \u0924\u0947<\/span> \u0930\u0915\u094d\u0937\u093e<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0939\u0941<\/span>, \u092a\u0930\u0942\u0902<\/span> \u0928<\/span> \u092e\u0948\u0902<\/span> \u092d\u0935<\/span>-\u0915\u0942\u092a\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092c\u0932<\/span> \u092c\u0941\u0926\u094d\u0927\u093f<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u0926\u094d\u092f\u093e<\/span> \u0926\u0947\u0939\u0941\u0902<\/span> \u092e\u094b\u0939\u093f<\/span>, \u0938\u0941\u0928\u0939\u0941<\/span> \u0938\u0930\u0938\u094d\u0935\u0924\u093f<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0924\u0941\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u0905\u0927\u092e<\/span> \u0930\u093e\u092e\u0938\u093e\u0917\u0930\u0939\u093f\u0902<\/span> \u0924\u0941\u092e<\/span>, \u0906\u0936\u094d\u0930\u092f<\/span> \u0926\u0947\u0909<\/span> \u092a\u0941\u0928\u093e\u0924\u0941\u0965<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"74","post_id":"78","lang_id":"2","post_title":"SHRI GOVARDHAN AARTI ","post_desc":"

Shri goverdhan maharaj, o maharaj,<\/p>\n

Tere mathe mukut viraj raho |<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Tope paan chade ,tope pool chade,<\/p>\n

Aur chade doodh ki dhar, o dhar|<\/p>\n

Tere mathe…<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Tere kanan mein kundal, sohe Tere gale vajyantimal.<\/p>\n

Tere mathe…<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Teri saat kosh ki parikrama, Teri de rahe nar aur naar.<\/p>\n

Tere mathe…<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Tere jatipura mein doodh chadat hai, Teri ho rahi jai jaikar.<\/p>\n

Tere mathe…<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Tere manshi ganga bahe sada, Teri maya aperampar.<\/p>\n

Tere mathe…<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u0906\u0930\u0924\u0940<\/span> \u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940<\/span> \u0930\u093e\u092e\u093e\u092f\u0923<\/span> \u091c\u0940<\/span> \u0915\u0940<\/span> ….<\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"77","post_id":"81","lang_id":"2","post_title":"SHRI RAMAYAN JI KI AARTI ","post_desc":"

Aarti Shri Ramayan ji ki, kirti kalit lalit Siya-pi ki <\/p>\n

Gavat Brahmadik Muni Narad, Valmiki vigyan visharad <\/p>\n

Shuk Sanakadi Shesh aru Sarad, barni Pavansut kirti niki <\/p>\n

Aarti Shri Ramayan ji ki,…<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Gavat Ved Puran ashtdash, chhahon Shastra sab granthan ko ras <\/p>\n

Munijan dhan santan ko sarbas, sar ansh sammat sab-hiki <\/p>\n

Aarti Shri Ramayan ji ki,…<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Gavat Santat Shambhu Bhavani, aru ghatsambhav muni vigyani <\/p>\n

Vyas adi kavibarj bakhani, Kakbhushundi Garur ke hi ki <\/p>\n

Aarti Shri Ramayan ji ki,…<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Kalimal harni vishay ras phiki, subhag singar mukti yuvati ki <\/p>\n

Dalan rog bhav muri ami ki, tat mat sab vidhi Tulsi ki <\/p>\n

Aarti Shri Ramayan ji ki,…<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"78","post_id":"82","lang_id":"2","post_title":"Lalita Mata Chalisa","post_desc":"

Jayati jayati jai lalite maataa ! Tav gud mahimaa hai vikhyaataa ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Too sundari, tripureshvaree devi ! Sur nar muni tere pad sevi ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Too kalyaadi kasht nivaaradi ! Too sukh daayani, vipadaa haaridi..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Moh vinaashini daitya naashini ! Bhakt bhaavini jyoti prakaashini ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Aadi shakti shri vidyaa roopaa ! Chakra swaamini deh anoopaa ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Hridaya nivaasini-bhakt taaridi ! Nana kasht vipati dal haaridi ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Dash vidya hai roop tumhaaraa ! Shree chandreshvari Naimish pyaaraa ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Dhoomaa, baglaa, bhairavi, taara ! Bhuvneshvari, kamlaa, vistaara ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Shodashi, chhinnamastaa maatangee ! Lalite shakti tumhaari sangi ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Lalite tum ho jyotit bhaalaa ! Bhakt jano ka kaam sambhaalaa ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Bhaari sankat jab-jab aaye ! Unse tumne bhakt bachaaye ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Jisne kripa tumhaari paayi ! Uski sab vidhi se ban aayi ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

sankat door karo maa bhaari ! Bhakt jano ko aas tumhaari ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Tripureshvari, shailjaa, bhavaani ! Jai jai jai shiv ki maharani ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Yog siddhi paaven sab yogi ! Bhoge bhog, maha sukh bhogi ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Kripa tumhaari paake mata ! Jeevan sukhmaya hai ban jaata ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Dukhiyon ko tumne apnaya ! Maha mood jo sharan na aaya ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Tumne jiski or nihaara ! Mili use sampati sukh saaraa ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Aadi shakti jai tripur pyaaree ! Mahashakti jai jai bhayahaari ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Kul yogini kundalini roopa ! Leela lalite kare anoopa ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Maha maheshvari maha shakti de ! Tripur sundari sadaa bhakti de ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Maha maha nande kalyadi ! Moonko ko deti ho vaadi ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Ikshaa gyaan kriyaa ka bhaagee ! Hota tab sevaa anuraagee ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Jo lalite teraa gud gave ! Use na koi kasht sataave ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Sarva mangle jwaala maalini ! Tum ho sarv shakti sanchaalini ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Aayaa maa jo sharan tumhaari ! Vipadaa hari usee ki saari ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Naamaa karshidi chintaa karshidi ! Sarva mohini sab sukh varshidi ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Mahima tab sab jag vikhyaataa ! Tum ho dayamayee jagmaataa ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Sab saubhaagya daayini lalita ! Tum ho sukhdaa karuna kalita ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Aanand sukh sampati deti ho ! Kasht bhayaanak har leti ho ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Man se jo jan tumko dhyaave ! Who turant man vaanchhit paave ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Lakshmi, durga, tum ho kaali ! Tumhi shaarda chakra kapaali ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Moolaadhaar, nivaasini jai jai ! Sahasraar gaaminee maa jai jai ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Chhai chakron ko bhedane waalee ! Karti ho sabkee rakhwaali ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

yogi bhogi krodhi kaami ! Sab hain sevak sab anugaami ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Sabko paar lagaati ho maa ! Sab par daya dikhaati ho maa ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Hemaavati umaa brahmaadi ! Bhandaasur ki hridaya vidaaridi ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Sarv vipati har sarvaadhaare ! Tumne kutil kupanthi taare ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Chandra dhaaridi, naimishvaasini ! Kripaa karo lalite adhnaashini ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Bhakt jano ko daras dikhaao ! Sanshaya bhai sab shighra mitaao ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Jo koi pade lalita chaalisa ! Hove sukh aanand adheesaa ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Jis par koi sankat aave ! Paath kare sankat mit jaave ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Dhyaan laga pade ikkis baara ! Poorna manorath hove sara ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Putra heen santati sukh paave ! Nirdhan dhanee bane gud gaave ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Is vidhi path kare jo koi ! Dukh bandhan chhute sukh hoee ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Jitendra chandra bhaartiya bataave ! Pade chaalisa to sukh paave ..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Sabse laghu upaaya yah jaano ! Sidh hoya man me jo tthaano..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

Lalita kare hridaya me baasaa ! Siddhi det lalita chaalisa..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

” Lalite maa ab kripa karo ! Siddh karo sab kaam..<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Sheshachal avtar tarak tu deva |<\/p>\n

Survar munivar bhave kariti jan seva ||<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Kamlaramna assi aganit gun theva |<\/p>\n

Kamlaksha maj rakshuni stavar var dhyava ||<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Jay dev jay dev jay venkatesha |<\/p>\n

Keval karunasindhu purvisi asha || Dhru.||<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Hey nijvaikunth mahuni dhyato me tu te |<\/p>\n

Dakhvisi gun kaise saklik lokate ||<\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

Dekhuni tujhe swaroop sukh adbhut hote |<\/p>\n

\u0965<\/span>Doha\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jai Jai Tulsi Bhagavati Satyavati Sukhdani\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Namo Namo Hari Preyasi Shri Vrinda Gun Khani\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Shri Hari Shish Birajini, Dehu Amar Var Amb\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

Janhit He Vrindavani Ab Na Karahu Vilamb\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0965<\/span>Chaupai\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Dhanya Dhanya Shri Tulasi Mata\u0964<\/span> Mahima Agam Sada Shruti Gata\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Hari Ke Pranahu Se Tum Pyari\u0964<\/span> Harihi Hetu Kinho Tap Bhaari\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Jab Prasann Hai Darshan Dinhyo\u0964<\/span> Tab Kar Jori Vinay Us Kinhyo\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

He Bhagvant Kant Mam Hohu\u0964<\/span> Deen Jaani Jani Chhadahu Chhohu\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Suni Lakshmi Tulasi Ki Baani\u0964<\/span> Dinho Shrap Kadh Par Aani\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Us Ayogya Var Maangan Haari\u0964<\/span> Hohu Vitap Tum Jad Tanu Dhaari\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Suni Tulasihi Shrapyo Tehim Thama\u0964<\/span> Karhu Vaas Tuhu Neechan Dhama\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Shiv Hit Lahi Kari Kapat Prasanga\u0964<\/span> Kiyo Satitva Dharm Tohi Bhanga\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Bhayo Jalandhar Kar Sanhara\u0964<\/span> Suni Ur Shok Upara\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

Yahi Kaaran Lahi Shrap Hamara\u0964<\/span> Hove Tanu Pashan Tumhara\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092f\u094b<\/span> \u0917\u094b\u092a<\/span> \u0935\u0939<\/span> \u0926\u093e\u0928\u0935<\/span> \u0930\u093e\u091c\u093e\u0964<\/span> \u0936\u0919\u094d\u0916<\/span> \u091a\u0941\u0921<\/span> \u0928\u093e\u092e\u0915<\/span> \u0936\u093f\u0930<\/span> \u0924\u093e\u091c\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0905\u0938<\/span> \u0926\u094d\u0935\u0948<\/span> \u0915\u0932\u094d\u092a<\/span> \u092c\u0940\u0924<\/span> \u091c\u092c<\/span> \u0917\u092f\u090a\u0964<\/span> \u0915\u0932\u094d\u092a<\/span> \u0924\u0943\u0924\u0940\u092f<\/span> \u091c\u0928\u094d\u092e<\/span> \u0924\u092c<\/span> \u092d\u092f\u090a\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0926\u0940\u092a\u0926\u093e\u0928<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u093f<\/span> \u092a\u0941\u0924\u094d\u0930<\/span> \u092b\u0932<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0935\u0939\u0940<\/span> \u092c\u0928\u094d\u0927\u094d\u092f\u0939\u0941<\/span> \u0928\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0906\u0936\u093f\u092f<\/span> \u0927\u0928<\/span> \u091c\u0928<\/span> \u0932\u0921\u093c\u0939\u093f<\/span> \u0917\u094d\u0930\u0939<\/span> \u092c\u0938\u0939\u0940<\/span> \u092a\u0942\u0930\u094d\u0923\u093e<\/span> \u0905\u0924\u094d\u0930\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0932\u093e\u0939\u0940<\/span> \u0905\u092d\u093f\u092e\u0924<\/span> \u092b\u0932<\/span> \u091c\u0917\u0924<\/span> \u092e\u0939<\/span> \u0932\u093e\u0939\u0940<\/span> \u092a\u0942\u0930\u094d\u0923<\/span> \u0938\u092c<\/span> \u0915\u093e\u092e\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u0947\u0908<\/span> \u0926\u0932<\/span> \u0905\u0930\u094d\u092a\u0939\u0940<\/span> \u0924\u0941\u0932\u0938\u0940<\/span> \u0924\u0902\u0939<\/span> \u0938\u0939\u0938<\/span> \u092c\u0938\u0939\u0940<\/span> \u0939\u0930\u0940\u0930\u093e\u092e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0924\u0941\u0932\u0938\u0940<\/span> \u092e\u0939\u093f\u092e\u093e<\/span> \u0928\u093e\u092e<\/span> \u0932\u0916<\/span> \u0924\u0941\u0932\u0938\u0940<\/span> \u0938\u0942\u0924<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0916\u0930\u093e\u092e\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u092e\u093e\u0928\u0938<\/span> \u091a\u093e\u0932\u0940\u0938<\/span> \u0930\u091a\u094d\u092f\u094b<\/span> \u091c\u0917<\/span> \u092e\u0939\u0902<\/span> \u0924\u0941\u0932\u0938\u0940\u0926\u093e\u0938\u0965<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"90","post_id":"94","lang_id":"1","post_title":"\u092a\u094d\u0930\u092d\u0941-\u091c\u0928\u094d\u092e \u0915\u0940 \u0906\u0930\u0924\u0940 ","post_desc":"

 <\/p>\n

\u092e\u093e\u0924\u093e<\/span> \u0930\u0942\u092a<\/span> \u0928\u093f\u0930\u0902\u091c\u0928<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0916<\/span> \u0938\u0902\u092a\u0924\u094d\u0924\u0940<\/span> \u0926\u093e\u0924\u093e\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u091c\u094b<\/span> \u0915\u094b\u0908<\/span> \u0924\u0941\u092e\u0915\u094b<\/span> \u0927\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0935\u0924<\/span> \u0928\u093f\u0924<\/span> \u092e\u0902\u0917\u0932<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0924\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u0924\u0942<\/span> \u0939\u0947<\/span> \u0939\u0948<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0924\u093e\u0932<\/span> \u092c\u0938\u0902\u0924\u0940<\/span> \u0924\u0942<\/span> \u0939\u0947<\/span> \u0939\u0948<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0916<\/span> \u0926\u093e\u0924\u093e\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0915\u0930\u094d\u092e\u093e<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u092d\u093e\u0935<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u0915\u093e\u0936\u0915<\/span> \u091c\u091c\u094d\u0928\u093f\u0926\u0927\u093f<\/span> \u0938\u0947<\/span> \u0924\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0924\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u091c\u093f\u0938<\/span> \u0918\u0930<\/span> \u0924\u093e\u0930\u094b<\/span> \u0935\u093e\u0938<\/span> \u0935\u0939\u0940<\/span> \u092e\u0947\u0902<\/span> \u0917\u0941\u0923<\/span> \u0906\u0924\u093e\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

\u0915\u0930<\/span> \u0928\u093e<\/span> \u0938\u0915\u0947<\/span> \u0938\u094b\u0908<\/span> \u0915\u0930<\/span> \u0932\u0947<\/span> \u092e\u0928<\/span> \u0928\u0939\u0940\u0902<\/span> \u0918\u092c\u0930\u093e\u0924\u093e\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

 <\/p>\n

\u0924\u0941\u092e<\/span> \u092c\u093f\u0928<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0916<\/span> \u0928\u093e<\/span> \u0939\u094b\u0935\u092f<\/span> \u092a\u0941\u0924\u0930\u093e<\/span> \u0928\u093e<\/span> \u0915\u094b\u0908<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0924\u093e\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

    \u0926\u0941\u0916\u0940<\/span>, \u0926\u0930\u093f\u0926\u094d\u0930\u0940<\/span>, \u0930\u094b\u0917\u0940<\/span>, \u0938\u0902\u0915\u091f<\/span> \u092e\u0941\u0915\u094d\u0924<\/span> \u0915\u093f\u090f<\/span> |

    \u0927\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0928<\/span> \u0927\u0930\u094d\u092f\u094b<\/span> \u091c\u094b<\/span> \u0928\u0930<\/span> \u0924\u0947\u0930\u094b<\/span>, \u092e\u0928\u0935\u093e\u0902\u091b\u093f\u0924<\/span> \u092b\u0932<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u092f\u094b<\/span> |

    \u0936\u0930\u0923<\/span> \u0917\u0939\u0947<\/span> \u0915\u0940<\/span> \u0932\u091c\u094d\u091c\u093e<\/span>, \u0930\u093e\u0916\u093f\u092f\u094b<\/span> \u091c\u0917\u0926\u092e\u094d\u092c\u0947<\/span> |

      \u092c\u0921\u093c\u0940<\/span> \u092e\u092e\u0924\u093e<\/span> \u0939\u0948<\/span> \u092c\u0921\u093c\u093e<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0930<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0902<\/span> \u0915\u0940<\/span> \u0906\u0901\u0916\u094b\u0902<\/span> \u092e\u0947\u0902<\/span>

      \u0915\u094d\u092f\u0942\u0902<\/span> \u0928<\/span> \u0926\u0947\u0916\u0942\u0902<\/span> \u092c\u093e\u0930\u092e\u094d\u092c\u093e\u0930<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0902<\/span> \u0915\u0940<\/span> \u0906\u0901\u0916\u094b\u0902<\/span> \u092e\u0947\u0902<\/span>

      \u0938\u0941\u0928\u094d\u0926\u0930<\/span> \u092d\u0935\u0928<\/span> \u092c\u0928\u093e\u092f\u093e<\/span> \u0924\u0947\u0930\u093e<\/span>,

      \u091c\u094b<\/span> \u0928\u0930<\/span> \u0906\u0930\u0924\u0940<\/span> \u092a\u0922\u093c\u0947<\/span> \u092a\u0922\u093c\u093e\u0935\u0947<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0901<\/span>

      \u0939\u0947<\/span> \u0936\u093e\u0930\u0926\u0947<\/span>! \u0915\u0939\u093e\u0901<\/span> \u0924\u0942<\/span> \u092c\u0940\u0923\u093e<\/span> \u092c\u091c\u093e<\/span> \u0930\u0939\u0940<\/span> \u0939\u0948<\/span> |
      \u0915\u093f\u0938<\/span> \u092e\u0902\u091c\u0941\u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0928<\/span> \u0938\u0947<\/span> \u0924\u0942<\/span> \u091c\u0917<\/span> \u0915\u094b<\/span> \u0932\u0941\u092d\u093e<\/span> \u0930\u0939\u0940<\/span> \u0939\u0948<\/span> |

      \u091c\u092f<\/span> \u0936\u0940\u0924\u0932\u093e<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0924\u093e<\/span>, \u092e\u0948\u092f\u093e<\/span> \u091c\u092f<\/span> \u0936\u0940\u0924\u0932\u093e<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0924\u093e<\/span>

        \u0926\u094d\u0926\u093f\u092d\u0941\u0935\u0928<\/span> \u0924\u093f\u092e\u093f\u0930<\/span> \u0928\u093f\u0915\u0902\u0926\u0928<\/span>, <\/span>\u092d\u0915\u094d\u0924<\/span> \u0939\u0943\u0926\u092f<\/span> \u091a\u0928\u094d\u0926\u0928\u0965<\/span> \u090a\u0901<\/span> \u091c\u092f<\/span>….<\/span><\/p>\n

        \u0926\u0941<\/span>:<\/span>\u0916\u0939\u093e\u0930\u0940<\/span>, <\/span>\u0938\u0941\u0916\u0915\u093e\u0930\u0940<\/span>, <\/span>\u092e\u093e\u0928\u0938<\/span> \u092e\u0932\u0939\u093e\u0930\u0940\u0965<\/span> \u090a\u0901<\/span> \u091c\u092f<\/span>….<\/span><\/p>\n

        \u091c\u092f<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0930<\/span> \u092e\u0941\u0928\u093f<\/span> \u092d\u0942\u0938\u0941\u0930<\/span> \u0935\u0928\u094d\u0926\u093f\u0924<\/span>, <\/span>\u0935\u093f\u092e\u0932<\/span> \u0935\u093f\u092d\u0935\u0936\u093e\u0932\u0940\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

        \u0905\u0918<\/span>-<\/span>\u0926\u0932<\/span>-<\/span>\u0926\u0932\u0928<\/span> \u0926\u093f\u0935\u093e\u0915\u0930<\/span>, <\/span>\u0926\u093f\u0935\u094d\u092f<\/span> \u0915\u093f\u0930\u0923<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0932\u0940\u0965<\/span> \u090a\u0901<\/span> \u091c\u092f<\/span>….<\/span><\/p>\n

            Jai shri vishwakarma prabhu, jai shri vishwakarma |<\/p>\n

            Sakal srishti ke karta, rakshak stuti dharma ||<\/p>\n

             <\/p>\n

            Aadi srishti me vidhi ko shruti updesh diya |<\/p>\n

            Jeev matra ka jag me, gyan vikas kiya ||<\/p>\n

             <\/p>\n

            Rishi angira tap se, shanti nahin pai |<\/p>\n

            Rog grast raja ne jab aashraya leena |<\/p>\n

            Sankat mochan bankar door duhkha keena ||<\/p>\n

            Jai shri vishwakarma.<\/p>\n

             <\/p>\n

            Jab rathkaar dampati, tumhari ter kari |<\/p>\n

            Sunkar deen prarthna, vipat hari sagari ||<\/p>\n

             <\/p>\n

            Ekanan chaturanan, panchanan raje |<\/p>\n

            Tribhuj chaturbhuj dashbhuj, sakal roop saje ||<\/p>\n

             <\/p>\n

            Dhyan dhare tab pad ka, sakal siddhi aave |<\/p>\n

            Mann dvividha mit jave, atal shakti pave ||<\/p>\n

             <\/p>\n

            Shri vishwakarma ki aarti jo koi gave |<\/p>\n

            Bhajat gajanand swami, sukh sampati pave ||<\/p>\n

             <\/p>\n

            Jai jai shri shanidev bhaktan hitakaari
            Sooraj ke putra prabhu chaaya mahataari. Jai..

            Shyaam ank vakra drasht chaturbhujaa dhaari
            Nilaambar dhaar naath gaj ki sawari. Jai..

            Kirit mukut shish sahaj deepat hai lilaari
            Muktan ki maal gale shobhit balihaari. Jai..

            Modak mishtaan paan chadhat hai supaari
            Lohaa til tel udad mahishi ati pyaari. Jai..

            Dev danuj rishi muni surat nar naari
            Vishwanaath dharat dhyaan sharan hai tumhaari. Jai..<\/span><\/p>"},{"post_des_id":"148","post_id":"152","lang_id":"1","post_title":"\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940 \u0930\u093e\u092e\u091a\u0902\u0926\u094d\u0930\u091c\u0940 \u0915\u0940 \u0906\u0930\u0924\u0940 ","post_desc":"

            \u0906\u092f\u093e<\/span> \u0938\u093e\u0925<\/span> \u0909\u0938\u0940<\/span> \u0915\u0947<\/span> \u0925\u093e<\/span>, \u092c\u093e\u0932\u0915<\/span> \u090f\u0915<\/span> \u092c\u0939\u0941\u0924<\/span> \u0938\u0941\u0928\u094d\u0926\u0930\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

            \u0906\u092f\u093e<\/span>, \u0906\u0915\u0930<\/span> \u0935\u0939\u0940\u0902<\/span> \u092c\u0938<\/span> \u0917\u092f\u093e<\/span>, \u092a\u093e\u0935\u0928<\/span> \u0936\u093f\u0930\u0921\u0940<\/span> \u0915\u093f\u092f\u093e<\/span> \u0928\u0917\u0930\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

             <\/p>\n

            \u0915\u0908<\/span> \u0926\u093f\u0928\u094b\u0902<\/span> \u0924\u0915<\/span> \u092d\u091f\u0915\u0924\u093e<\/span>, \u092d\u093f\u0915\u094d\u0937\u093e<\/span> \u092e\u093e\u0901\u0917<\/span> \u0909\u0938\u0928\u0947<\/span> \u0926\u0930<\/span>-\u0926\u0930\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

            \u0914\u0930<\/span> \u0926\u093f\u0916\u093e\u0908<\/span> \u0910\u0938\u0940<\/span> \u0932\u0940\u0932\u093e<\/span>, \u091c\u0917<\/span> \u092e\u0947\u0902<\/span> \u091c\u094b<\/span> \u0939\u094b<\/span> \u0917\u0908<\/span> \u0905\u092e\u0930\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

            \u091c\u0948\u0938\u0947<\/span>-\u091c\u0948\u0938\u0947<\/span> \u0905\u092e\u0930<\/span> \u0909\u092e\u0930<\/span> \u092c\u0922\u093c\u0940<\/span>, \u092c\u0922\u093c\u0924\u0940<\/span> \u0939\u0940<\/span> \u0935\u0948\u0938\u0947<\/span> \u0917\u0908<\/span> \u0936\u093e\u0928\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

            '\u0905\u0932\u094d\u0932\u093e<\/span> \u092d\u0932\u093e<\/span> \u0915\u0930\u0947\u0917\u093e<\/span> \u0924\u0947\u0930\u093e<\/span>' \u092a\u0941\u0924\u094d\u0930<\/span> \u091c\u0928\u094d\u092e<\/span> \u0939\u094b<\/span> \u0924\u0947\u0930\u0947<\/span> \u0918\u0930\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

            \u0905\u092c<\/span> \u0924\u0915<\/span> \u0928\u0939\u0940\u0902<\/span> \u0915\u093f\u0938\u0940<\/span> \u0928\u0947<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u092f\u093e<\/span>, \u0938\u093e\u0908<\/span> \u0915\u0940<\/span> \u0915\u0943\u092a\u093e<\/span> \u0915\u093e<\/span> \u092a\u093e\u0930\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

            \u092a\u0941\u0924\u094d\u0930<\/span> \u0930\u0924\u094d\u0928<\/span> \u0926\u0947<\/span> \u092e\u0926\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0938\u0940<\/span> \u0915\u094b<\/span>, \u0927\u0928\u094d\u092f<\/span> \u0915\u093f\u092f\u093e<\/span> \u0909\u0938\u0915\u093e<\/span> \u0938\u0902\u0938\u093e\u0930\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

            \u0924\u0928<\/span>-\u092e\u0928<\/span> \u0938\u0947<\/span> \u091c\u094b<\/span> \u092d\u091c\u0947<\/span> \u0909\u0938\u0940<\/span> \u0915\u093e<\/span>, \u091c\u0917<\/span> \u092e\u0947\u0902<\/span> \u0939\u094b\u0924\u093e<\/span> \u0939\u0948<\/span> \u0909\u0926\u094d\u0927\u093e\u0930\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

            \u0938\u093e\u0902\u091a<\/span> \u0915\u094b<\/span> \u0906\u0902\u091a<\/span> \u0928\u0939\u0940\u0902<\/span> \u0939\u0948\u0902<\/span> \u0915\u094b\u0908<\/span>, \u0938\u0926\u093e<\/span> \u091d\u0942\u0920<\/span> \u0915\u0940<\/span> \u0939\u094b\u0924\u0940<\/span> \u0939\u093e\u0930\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n

            \u092e\u0948\u0902<\/span> \u0939\u0942\u0902<\/span> \u0938\u0926\u093e<\/span> \u0938\u0939\u093e\u0930\u0947<\/span> \u0909\u0938\u0915\u0947<\/span>, \u0938\u0926\u093e<\/span> \u0930\u0939\u0942\u0901\u0917\u093e<\/span> \u0909\u0938\u0915\u093e<\/span> \u0926\u093e\u0938\u0964<\/span><\/p>\n

            \u0938\u093e\u0908<\/span> \u091c\u0948\u0938\u093e<\/span> \u092a\u094d\u0930\u092d\u0941<\/span> \u092e\u093f\u0932\u093e<\/span> \u0939\u0948<\/span>, \u0907\u0924\u0928\u0940<\/span> \u0939\u0940<\/span> \u0915\u092e<\/span> \u0939\u0948<\/span> \u0915\u094d\u092f\u093e<\/span> \u0906\u0938\u0965<\/span><\/p>\n
